0.name: Ciri
0.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
0.ability:
Deploy: Damage 3 enemy units by 1.
Whenever you lose a Round, return this unit to your hand.
0.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage 3 enemy units by 1. Whenever you lose a Round, return this unit to your hand.
0.flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.

1.name: Geralt: Igni
1.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Initiative: Trigger this ability if using this card is the first action of your turn.
1.ability:
Deploy: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 35 or more power.
Initiative: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 20 or more power instead.
1.abilityHTML: Deploy: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 35 or more power. Initiative: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 20 or more power instead.
1.flavor: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.

2.name: Geralt of Rivia
2.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
2.ability: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
2.abilityHTML: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
2.flavor: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.

3.name: Regis
3.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Initiative: Trigger this ability if using this card is the first action of your turn.
3.ability:
Deploy: Damage all units on an enemy row by 1.
Initiative: If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
3.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage all units on an enemy row by 1. Initiative: If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
3.flavor: Some consider me a monster. A blood-crazed, savage monster.

4.name: Regis: Higher Vampire
4.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Drain: Deal damage and boost self by the same amount.
4.ability: Order (Melee): Drain an enemy by the amount of boost it has.
4.abilityHTML: Order (Melee): Drain an enemy by the amount of boost it has.
4.flavor: He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.

5.name: Triss Merigold
5.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
5.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy unit by its power.
5.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy unit by its power.
5.flavor: I can take care of myself. Trust me.

6.name: Villentretenmerth
6.ability: After 2 allied turns, on turn end, destroy the highest unit on the battlefield, excluding self.
6.abilityHTML: After 2 allied turns, on turn end, destroy the highest unit on the battlefield, excluding self.
6.flavor: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.

7.name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
7.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
7.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage all other units by 2. 
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units by 2.
7.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage all other units by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units by 2.
7.flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.

8.name: Zoltan: Scoundrel
8.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
8.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Spawn and play Duda: Agitator.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
8.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Spawn and play Duda: Agitator. Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
8.flavor: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.

9.name: Ciri: Dash
9.ability: After 4 allied turns, on turn end, draw a card.
9.abilityHTML: After 4 allied turns, on turn end, draw a card.
9.flavor: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.

10.name: Geralt: Aard
10.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
10.ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage 3 enemy units by 2, then move them to the Ranged row.
10.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage 3 enemy units by 2, then move them to the Ranged row.
10.flavor: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.

11.name: Avallac'h: Sage
11.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
11.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Play an artifact from your deck.
11.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Play an artifact from your deck.
11.flavor: Amongst the free elves were a handful of Aen Saevherne, or Sages. They were an enigma, bordering on a legend.

12.name: Yennefer: Conjurer
12.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
12.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Deal 1 damage to the highest enemy unit(s). Cooldown 1.
12.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Deal 1 damage to the highest enemy unit(s). Cooldown 1.
12.flavor: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice… and when to conjure fire.

13.name: Dudu
13.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
13.ability: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
13.abilityHTML: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
13.flavor: A mimic, among the many other names for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings… or dopplers.

14.name: Eskel
14.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
14.ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
14.abilityHTML: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
14.flavor: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…

15.name: Vesemir
15.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
15.ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
15.abilityHTML: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
15.flavor: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.

16.name: Lambert
16.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
16.ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
16.abilityHTML: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
16.flavor: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.

17.name: Myrgtabrakke
17.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
17.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage 2 enemy units by 2.
17.flavor: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.

18.name: Ocvist
18.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
18.ability: Order: Damage all enemy units by 1.
18.abilityHTML: Order: Damage all enemy units by 1.
18.flavor: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.

19.name: Olgierd von Everec
19.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
19.abilityHTML: Order: Heal self. Cooldown: 1.
19.flavor: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.

20.name: Operator
20.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
20.ability: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand to this row on each player's side.
20.abilityHTML: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand to this row on each player's side.
20.flavor: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.

21.name: Prize-Winning Cow
21.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

22.name: Roach
22.keywordsHTML: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
22.ability: Whenever you play a gold card, Summon this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
22.abilityHTML: Whenever you play a gold card, Summon this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
22.flavor: Geralt, we gotta have a man–to–horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.

23.name: Johnny
23.ability: Whenever you play a special card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
23.abilityHTML: Whenever you play a special card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
23.flavor: Life without savoring the sound of surreptitious shananacking is like licking snails through a cloth.

24.name: Sarah
24.ability: Whenever you play a special card, boost a random allied unit by 2.
24.abilityHTML: Whenever you play a special card, boost a random allied unit by 2.

25.name: Francis Bedlam
25.ability: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost the lowest unit in your hand by 1.
25.abilityHTML: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost the lowest unit in your hand by 1.
25.flavor: I might just discover I look great without ears… or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.

26.name: Cyprian Wiley
26.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
26.ability: Deploy: Banish a unit with power 3 or less.
26.abilityHTML: Deploy: Banish a unit with power 3 or less.
26.flavor: Ever since his father died, he's become a real whoreson.

27.name: Iris von Everec
27.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
27.ability: Deploy: Give an allied unit Vitality (4).
27.abilityHTML: Deploy: Give an allied unit Vitality (4).
27.flavor: I remember so little… Yet when I think of my rose, I begin to recall what was.

28.name: Unicorn
28.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
28.ability: Deploy: Boost a unit by 3. If you control Chironex, double that amount.
28.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost a unit by 3. If you control Chironex, double that amount.
28.flavor: They say unicorns are fond of virgins. Since finding a virgin these days is as hard as finding a unicorn, no one has been able to verify the theory.

29.name: Chironex
29.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
29.ability: Deploy: Damage a unit by 3. If you control Unicorn, double that amount.
29.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage a unit by 3. If you control Unicorn, double that amount.
29.flavor: Gods, that's no unicorn! That's…! – the last words of Vilemar, a famed collector of curiosities.

30.name: Duda: Companion
30.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
30.ability:
Doomed.
Boost all units on a row by 1.
30.abilityHTML: Doomed. Boost all units on a row by 1.
30.flavor: Knows one hundred words – eighty of them curses, the rest, connectors.

31.name: Duda: Agitator
31.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
31.ability:
Doomed.
Damage all units on a row by 1.
31.abilityHTML: Doomed. Damage all units on a row by 1.
31.flavor: Zoltan's parrot had the extraordinary ability to irritate anyone who spent time with it. Including Zoltan.

32.name: Fiend
32.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
32.ability: Deploy: Boost all Deathwish units in your hand by 1.
32.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost all Deathwish units in your hand by 1.
32.flavor: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.

33.name: Ragh Nar Roog
33.keywordsHTML: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cataclysm: At the start of the owner's turn, split 3 damage randomly between units in this row.
33.ability: Spawn Cataclysm on an enemy row for 4 turns.
33.abilityHTML: Spawn Cataclysm on an enemy row for 4 turns.
33.flavor: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos.

34.name: The Last Wish
34.keywordsHTML: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
34.ability: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
34.abilityHTML: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
34.flavor: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.

35.name: Decoy
35.ability: Shuffle an allied unit on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
35.abilityHTML: Shuffle an allied unit on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
35.flavor: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.

36.name: Merigold's Hailstorm
36.flavor: The sky dimmed of a sudden, and clouds amassed over the town. It grew fiendishly dark, and a cold gust swept in. Oh my, gasped Yennefer. We're about to make quite the mess, I think.

37.name: Skellige Storm
37.keywordsHTML: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
37.ability: Spawn Storm on an enemy row for 2 turns.
37.abilityHTML: Spawn Storm on an enemy row for 2 turns.
37.flavor: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.

38.name: Stammelford's Tremors
38.flavor: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.

39.name: Dimeritium Bomb
39.keywordsHTML: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
39.ability: Damage a unit by 4 and give it Veil.
39.abilityHTML: Damage a unit by 4 and give it Veil.
39.flavor: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.

40.name: Blizzard
40.keywordsHTML: Initiative: Trigger this ability if using this card is the first action of your turn.
40.ability:
Destroy the lowest power unit.
Initiative: Destroy all units with the lowest power.
40.abilityHTML: Destroy the lowest power unit. Initiative: Destroy all units with the lowest power.
40.flavor: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.

41.name: Commander's Horn
41.flavor: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.

42.name: Vaedermakar
42.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
42.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Increase all row effect durations by 1.
Deploy (Ranged): Decrease all row effect durations by 1.
If you control Scepter of Storms, increase or decrease durations by 3 instead.
42.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Increase all row effect durations by 1. Deploy (Ranged): Decrease all row effect durations by 1. If you control Scepter of Storms, increase or decrease durations by 3 instead.
42.flavor: The druid Vaedermakar controls the elements. He soothes storms into silence, musters destructive hail, summons lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat him with utmost respect.

43.name: Alzur's Double-Cross
43.ability: Play the highest unit from your deck.
43.abilityHTML: Play the highest unit from your deck.
43.flavor: A few of Alzur's monstrous creations roam the world still. Not least among them the horrid viy, who massacred its mage-creator and destroyed half of Maribor before fleeing into Riverdell's gloomy woodland.

44.name: Alzur's Thunder
44.flavor: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.

45.name: Biting Frost
45.keywordsHTML: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
45.ability: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 3 turns.
45.abilityHTML: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 3 turns.
45.flavor: Best thing about frost? Bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.

46.name: Clear Skies
46.ability: Boost all units in an ally row by 1.
46.abilityHTML: Boost all units in an ally row by 1.
46.flavor: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…

47.name: Impenetrable Fog
47.keywordsHTML: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Fog: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the lowest power unit in this row by 2.
47.ability: Spawn Fog on an enemy row for 3 turns.
47.abilityHTML: Spawn Fog on an enemy row for 3 turns.
47.flavor: A good commander's dream… and a bad one's horror.

48.name: Manticore Venom
48.flavor: Kills quicker than you can recite the Emperor of Nilfgaard's title in full.

49.name: Adrenaline Rush
49.ability: Boost an allied unit by 8 if there are no other units on that row.
49.abilityHTML: Boost an allied unit by 8 if there are no other units on that row.
49.flavor: The beast rushed at them wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…

50.name: Epidemic
50.flavor: Epidemics respect no persons, no borders.

51.name: Scorch
51.keywordsHTML: Initiative: Trigger this ability if using this card is the first action of your turn.
51.ability:
Destroy the highest-power unit.
Initiative: Destroy all highest-power units instead.
51.abilityHTML: Destroy the highest-power unit. Initiative: Destroy all highest-power units instead.
51.flavor: Geralt took one step back. He'd seen men hit by Scorch before. Or more accurately, seen what remained of them afterwards.

52.name: Swallow
52.flavor: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.

53.name: Thunderbolt
53.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
53.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 3. 
Charge: 2.
53.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Boost an allied unit by 3. Charge: 2.
53.flavor: The witcher's face changed… his mien turning inhuman, horrifying.

54.name: Torrential Rain
54.keywordsHTML: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
54.ability: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 3 turns.
54.abilityHTML: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 3 turns.
54.flavor: Even the rain in this land smells vile.

55.name: An Craite Warcrier
55.ability: Bloodthirst 1: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
55.abilityHTML: Bloodthirst 1: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
55.flavor: Every man, woman and child in Skellige can split a foe with an axe. Only a select few can split enemy ears with a rage-filled cry.

56.name: Bekker's Dark Mirror
56.ability: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
56.abilityHTML: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
56.flavor: Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.

57.name: Renew
57.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
57.ability: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
57.abilityHTML: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.

58.name: Dimeritium Shackles
58.keywordsHTML: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
58.ability: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
58.abilityHTML: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
58.flavor: The mage's arms were twisted and bound behind his back. The Redanians gave the fetters a good shake. Terranova cried out, lurched, bent backwards, bowed forward, then retched and groaned. It was clear of what his manacles were made.

59.name: Mardroeme
59.ability: Damage a unit by 3, then boost it by 9.
59.abilityHTML: Damage a unit by 3, then boost it by 9.
59.flavor: Eat enough of them, and the world will never be the same…

60.name: Bloody Baron
60.keywordsHTML: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
60.ability:
Formation.
Order: Reset the power of a unit.
Inspired: If it was boosted, give it Bleeding for the duration equal to the amount of boost it lost.
60.abilityHTML: Formation. Order: Reset the power of a unit. Inspired: If it was boosted, give it Bleeding for the duration equal to the amount of boost it lost.
60.flavor: I've not been a good father, I know, but… perhaps it's not too late.

61.name: Vernon Roche
61.keywordsHTML: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
61.ability:
Disloyal. 
Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
61.abilityHTML: Disloyal. Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
61.flavor: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.

62.name: John Natalis
62.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
62.ability: Deploy (Melee): Play a Warfare card from your deck.
62.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Play a Warfare card from your deck.
62.flavor: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.

63.name: Lined Pockets
63.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
63.ability:
Order: Gain 1 Coin. Charge: 6
Whenever you play a Crime card, gain 1 Coin.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
63.abilityHTML: Order: Gain 1 Coin. Charge: 6 Whenever you play a Crime card, gain 1 Coin. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
63.flavor: Really believe you can dupe me with that tale you just pulled from your arse?

64.name: Shani
64.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
64.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Summon a bronze Human unit from your graveyard to this row and give it Doomed.
Cooldown: 7.
64.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Summon a bronze Human unit from your graveyard to this row and give it Doomed. Cooldown: 7.
64.flavor: I'm a medic. I tend to know what I'm doing when I prescribe something.

65.name: Triss: Butterflies
65.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
65.ability: Deploy: Boost a random unit in your hand by 4.
65.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost a random unit in your hand by 4.
65.flavor: Cap'n… our arrows, they've… they've got wings!

66.name: Keira Metz
66.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
66.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Give Vitality to adjacent units for the duration equal to their base power.
66.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Give Vitality to adjacent units for the duration equal to their base power.
66.flavor: If I'm to die today, I wish to look smashing for the occasion.

67.name: Dandelion
67.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
67.ability:
Order: Boost a unit in your deck by 2.
Cooldown: 2.
Inspired: At the end of your turn, boost the top unit in your deck by 1.
67.abilityHTML: Order: Boost a unit in your deck by 2. Cooldown: 2. Inspired: At the end of your turn, boost the top unit in your deck by 1.
67.flavor: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a liar – and my best friend.

68.name: Priscilla
68.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
68.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Heal an allied unit by 4 and reset its Cooldown.
Inspired: Boost an allied unit by 4 and reset its Cooldown instead.
68.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Heal an allied unit by 4 and reset its Cooldown. Inspired: Boost an allied unit by 4 and reset its Cooldown instead.
68.flavor: Picture Dandelion in a dress and you've got the general idea.

69.name: Thaler
69.keywordsHTML: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
69.ability:
Formation.
Order: If neither player has passed and your opponent's hand is not full, both players draw a card.
69.abilityHTML: Formation. Order: If neither player has passed and your opponent's hand is not full, both players draw a card.
69.flavor: Piss off! We aren't all philanderers. Some of us have depth…

70.name: Ves
70.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
70.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Order: Give an allied unit Zeal.
Cooldown: 3.
70.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Order: Give an allied unit Zeal. Cooldown: 3.
70.flavor: Better to live one day as a king than a whole life as a beggar.

71.name: Síle de Tansarville
71.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
71.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
71.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
71.flavor: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.

72.name: Sabrina Glevissig
72.keywordsHTML: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
72.ability:
Disloyal.
Deathwish: Damage all units on this row by 3.
72.abilityHTML: Disloyal. Deathwish: Damage all units on this row by 3.
72.flavor: The Daughter of the Kaedweni Wilderness.

73.name: Dethmold
73.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
73.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Boost all allied Mages by 1.
73.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Boost all allied Mages by 1.
73.flavor: I once made a prisoner vomit his own entrails… Ah, good times…

74.name: Prince Stennis
74.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
74.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Boost an allied unit by 4.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost 4 allied units by 1.
74.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Boost an allied unit by 4. Deploy (Ranged): Boost 4 allied units by 1.
74.flavor: He wears armor made of gold. Of course he's a jerk.

75.name: Trollololo
75.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Resupply: Trigger this ability whenever you play a Warfare card.
75.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Lose all Armor and boost self by that amount.
Resupply: Gain 2 Armor.
75.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Lose all Armor and boost self by that amount. Resupply: Gain 2 Armor.
75.flavor: Join me King Ravodid army. Order got – guard boatses.

76.name: Princess Pavetta
76.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
76.ability: Deploy: Shuffle a bronze unit and all copies of it from your graveyard into your deck.
76.abilityHTML: Deploy: Shuffle a bronze unit and all copies of it from your graveyard into your deck.
76.flavor: They said the queen was prone to outbursts, but I did not expect that…

77.name: Margarita Laux-Antille
77.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
77.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Lock an enemy unit.
77.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Lock an enemy unit.
77.flavor: I care only about what's good for Aretuza and my pupils.

78.name: Nenneke
78.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
78.ability:
Zeal.
Order (Ranged): Boost a unit by 1. 
Charge: 4.
78.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order (Ranged): Boost a unit by 1. Charge: 4.
78.flavor: Few know more about healing than Nenneke.

79.name: Odrin
79.keywordsHTML: Resupply: Trigger this ability whenever you play a Warfare card. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
79.ability:
Resupply: Boost self by 1.
Inspired: Boost self by 2 instead.
79.abilityHTML: Resupply: Boost self by 1. Inspired: Boost self by 2 instead.
79.flavor: Drinkin' without Odrin is like rowin' without a paddle.

80.name: Kaedweni Sergeant
80.keywordsHTML: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
80.ability:
Formation. 
Order: Boost an allied unit by 1. Charges: 2
80.abilityHTML: Formation. Order: Boost an allied unit by 1. Charges: 2
80.flavor: Forward, you sorry sods! Forward or you'll see the Nilfgaardians are the least of your worries!

81.name: Carlo Varese
81.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
81.ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each card in your hand.
81.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each card in your hand.
81.flavor: Everyone wantin' to trade in Novigrad's got a clear choice - agree terms with Cleaver or kiss their knees farewell.

82.name: Ballista
82.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
82.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. 
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
82.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
82.flavor: What crossbows want to be when they grow up.

83.name: Reinforced Ballista
83.keywordsHTML: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Resupply: Trigger this ability whenever you play a Warfare card.
83.ability:
Formation. Order: Damage a unit by 1. Cooldown: 1.
Resupply: Reduce the Cooldown by 1.
83.abilityHTML: Formation. Order: Damage a unit by 1. Cooldown: 1. Resupply: Reduce the Cooldown by 1.
83.flavor: Never manages to hit the same place twice, which, upon further reflection, might constitute a real problem.

84.name: Bombardment
84.ability: Split 4 damage randomly between all enemy units. Increase the damage by 1 for each Siege Engine you control.
84.abilityHTML: Split 4 damage randomly between all enemy units. Increase the damage by 1 for each Siege Engine you control.
84.flavor: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!

85.name: Siege Tower
85.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
85.ability:
Deploy: Gain Vitality for 4 turns.
Crew: Boost self by 4 instead.
85.abilityHTML: Deploy: Gain Vitality for 4 turns. Crew: Boost self by 4 instead.
85.flavor: The latest rage in assaults on walled cities.

86.name: Redanian Knight
86.keywordsHTML: Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Exposed: Trigger this ability whenever the unit loses its Armor. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
86.ability:
Barricade (Ranged): At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
Exposed: Move self to the Melee row, then damage the highest power enemy unit by 2.
86.abilityHTML: Barricade (Ranged): At the end of your turn, boost self by 1. Exposed: Move self to the Melee row, then damage the highest power enemy unit by 2.

87.name: Siege Support
87.keyword: deploy, melee, cooldown, ranged, order, zeal
87.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
87.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Reduce Cooldown of an allied unit by 1.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 1.
Order: Give an allied unit Zeal.
87.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Reduce Cooldown of an allied unit by 1. Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 1. Order: Give an allied unit Zeal.
87.flavor: You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees.\nDo what by the what now?

88.name: Blue Stripes Scout
88.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
88.ability: Deploy (Melee): Spawn a copy of a bronze allied unit at the bottom of your deck.
88.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Spawn a copy of a bronze allied unit at the bottom of your deck.
88.flavor: Blue Stripes and Scoia'tael are similar in one regard – hatred fuels both.

89.name: Blue Stripes Commando
89.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
89.ability: Order: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
89.abilityHTML: Order: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
89.flavor: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly though, I kill for her.

90.name: Field Medic
90.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
90.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost adjacent units by 2.
90.flavor: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything will be all right.

91.name: Dun Banner
91.keywordsHTML: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
91.ability: Whenever Dun Banner receives a boost, Summon all copies of it from your deck to this row.
91.abilityHTML: Whenever Dun Banner receives a boost, Summon all copies of it from your deck to this row.
91.flavor: Stay calm, everyone. And be alert. The true owners of those cloaks and beaver–skin caps might be elsewhere.

92.name: Kaedweni Cavalry
92.keywordsHTML: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
92.ability:
Shield.
Whenever this unit loses its Shield, boost self by 2.
92.abilityHTML: Shield. Whenever this unit loses its Shield, boost self by 2.
92.flavor: Always wondered – how the blazes do those lads handle nature's call…?

93.name: Reinforced Trebuchet
93.keywordsHTML: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
93.ability:
Ranged: At the end of your turn, damage a random enemy unit on Ranged row by 1.
Crew: Damage a random enemy unit by 1 instead.
93.abilityHTML: Ranged: At the end of your turn, damage a random enemy unit on Ranged row by 1. Crew: Damage a random enemy unit by 1 instead.
93.flavor: Feel that? The earth trembles each time Big Bertha looses a stone.

94.name: Temerian Infantry
94.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
94.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each boosted unit in this row.
94.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each boosted unit in this row.
94.flavor: Temeria! Temeria! Gods shed all grace on thee! And smite thy foes with horrid woes, for all eternity!

95.name: Redanian Elite
95.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Exposed: Trigger this ability whenever the unit loses its Armor.
95.ability:
Deploy: Boost self by 6.
Exposed: Reset own power.
95.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost self by 6. Exposed: Reset own power.
95.flavor: I'll die for Redania, I'll kill for Redania… I'll even eat worms for Redania!

96.name: Siege Master
96.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Resupply: Trigger this ability whenever you play a Warfare card.
96.ability:
Order: Boost an ally by 2.
Resupply: Boost adjacent Siege Engines by 1.
96.abilityHTML: Order: Boost an ally by 2. Resupply: Boost adjacent Siege Engines by 1.

97.name: Botchling
97.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
97.ability:
Every allied turn, on turn end, damage the highest enemy unit by 1. 
Order: Transform into Lubberkin.
97.abilityHTML: Every allied turn, on turn end, damage the highest enemy unit by 1. Order: Transform into Lubberkin.
97.flavor: Admit your mistakes and bury them proper – else they'll come back to haunt you.

98.name: Lubberkin
98.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
98.ability:
Every allied turn, on turn end, boost the lowest allied unit by 1. 
Order: Transform into Botchling.
98.abilityHTML: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost the lowest allied unit by 1. Order: Transform into Botchling.
98.flavor: I name thee Dea and embrace thee as my daughter.

99.name: Vicovaro Novice
99.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
99.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Draw a card, then place a card from your hand at the top of your deck.
99.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Draw a card, then place a card from your hand at the top of your deck.
99.flavor: Mages in Nilfgaard are disposable. If one disappoints the Emperor, a dozen others await to provide what he requires.

100.name: Reinforcements
100.keywordsHTML: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
100.ability: Spawn and play a base copy of a bronze allied unit.
100.abilityHTML: Spawn and play a base copy of a bronze allied unit.
100.flavor: Sound the retreat! Regroup! And wait for reinforcements!

101.name: Carapace
101.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
101.ability:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 3. If it's a Monster unit, also give it Veil. Charges: 3.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
101.abilityHTML: Order: Boost an allied unit by 3. If it's a Monster unit, also give it Veil. Charges: 3. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
101.flavor: Have some dignity. You know how this will end.

102.name: Ge'els
102.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
102.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Play a Wild Hunt special card from your deck.
102.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Play a Wild Hunt special card from your deck.
102.flavor: Paintings should convey emotion, not words.

103.name: Draug
103.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
103.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Transform all Human units on an allied row into Kaedweni Revenants without changing their power.
103.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Transform all Human units on an allied row into Kaedweni Revenants without changing their power.
103.flavor: Some men cannot admit defeat. Some keep fighting from beyond the grave.

104.name: Imlerith's Wrath
104.ability:
Damage an enemy unit by the power of your highest unit.
If you control Imlerith, destroy an enemy unit instead.
104.abilityHTML:
Damage an enemy unit by the power of your highest unit.
If you control Imlerith, destroy an enemy unit instead.
104.flavor: He boasted that no weapon would ever pierce his armor. And he was right — even in death.

105.name: Force of Nature
105.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
105.ability:
Order: Spawn and play Woodland Spirit.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
105.abilityHTML: Order: Spawn and play Woodland Spirit. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
105.flavor: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village'll starve.

106.name: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel
106.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
106.ability: Deploy: Spawn a 1-power base copy of a Monster unit with a provision cost of 10 or less from your hand on this row.
106.abilityHTML: Deploy: Spawn a 1-power base copy of a Monster unit with a provision cost of 10 or less from your hand on this row.
106.flavor: A favorite son who chose a life of villainy.

107.name: Avallac'h
107.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
107.ability: Deploy: Spawn and play Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, or Torrential Rain.
107.abilityHTML: Deploy: Spawn and play Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, or Torrential Rain.

108.name: Caretaker
108.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Purify: Remove all statuses. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
108.ability:
Zeal. Order: Purify a unit.
Cooldown: 2.
108.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Purify a unit. Cooldown: 2.
108.flavor: There are more things in heaven and earth than all the world's philosophers have dreamt.

109.name: Kayran
109.keywordsHTML: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
109.abilityHTML: Immunity. Deploy: Consume 3 allied units.
109.flavor: How to kill a kayran? Simple! Take your best sword… then sell it, and hire a witcher.

110.name: Miruna
110.keywordsHTML: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
110.ability: Deathwish: Seize a random enemy unit with 4 or less power.
110.abilityHTML: Deathwish: Seize a random enemy unit with 4 or less power.
110.flavor: Why fight? There are much better ways to work off excess energy…

111.name: Arachas Behemoth
111.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
111.ability: Deploy: Spawn 2 Drones and boost all other Insectoids in this row by 1.
111.abilityHTML: Deploy: Spawn 2 Drones and boost all other Insectoids in this row by 1.
111.flavor: Like a cross between a crab, a spider… and a mountain.

112.name: Mourntart
112.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
112.ability: Order (Melee): Banish all units in your graveyard, then boost self by 1 for each.
112.abilityHTML: Order (Melee): Banish all units in your graveyard, then boost self by 1 for each.
112.flavor: Most grave hags feed on rotten remains dug out of graves. Yet some sneak into huts, steal children, kill the elderly and in general make very undesirable neighbors.

113.name: Abaya
113.keywordsHTML: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
113.ability:
Thrive. 
Deploy: Trigger a bronze allied unit's Deathwish ability.
113.abilityHTML: Thrive. Deploy: Trigger a bronze allied unit's Deathwish ability.
113.flavor: Seen a lot o' ugly critters in me life – morays, lampreys, blobfish… But never nothin' like this!

114.name: Frightener: Dormant
114.ability: After 3 allied units are destroyed, awaken Frightener.
114.abilityHTML: After 3 allied units are destroyed, awaken Frightener.
114.flavor: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.

115.name: Morvudd
115.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
115.ability: Deploy: Boost all allied Beast units by 1.
115.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost all allied Beast units by 1.

116.name: Whispess
116.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
116.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Increase this damage by 2 whenever you play a Crone.
116.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Increase this damage by 2 whenever you play a Crone.
116.flavor: I'd be your best – and last.

117.name: Brewess
117.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
117.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Charge: 1.
Increase the number of Charges by 1 whenever you play a Crone.
117.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Consume an allied unit. Charge: 1. Increase the number of Charges by 1 whenever you play a Crone.
117.flavor: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you'll make.

118.name: Weavess
118.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
118.ability: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 2. Increase this boost by 2 whenever you play a Crone.
118.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 2. Increase this boost by 2 whenever you play a Crone.
118.flavor: I sense your pain. I see your fear.

119.name: Imperial Manticore
119.keywordsHTML: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
119.abilityHTML: Deathwish: Destroy the lowest enemy.
119.flavor: One of the world's oldest and deadliest monsters. I used to feel excitement at moments like this. Now the beast is only an obstacle in my way. Its meat and hot blood will help me survive this icy hell.

120.name: Colossal Ifrit
120.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
120.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Damage all units on the opposite row by 1.
Cooldown: 3.
120.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Damage all units on the opposite row by 1. Cooldown: 3.
120.flavor: Can't stand the heat? Then you don't stand a chance.

121.name: Nekker Warrior
121.keywordsHTML: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
121.flavor: Take heed, gents, there's nekkers under this here bridge.

122.name: Ice Giant
122.flavor: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.

123.name: Primordial D'ao
123.keywordsHTML: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
123.flavor: How do you fight an earth elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.

124.name: Nithral
124.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
124.ability:
Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1.
Dominance: Damage a unit by 2 instead.
Cooldown: 1.
124.abilityHTML: Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1. Dominance: Damage a unit by 2 instead. Cooldown: 1.
124.flavor: Each Wild Hunt warrior has gone through a rigorous selection process, but Eredin's personal cavalcade includes only the most brutal and most ferocious of the Aen Elle.

125.name: Gaunter O'Dimm
125.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
125.ability:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Doomed.
Order: Destroy a Doomed enemy unit.
125.abilityHTML: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Doomed. Order: Destroy a Doomed enemy unit.
125.flavor: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.

126.name: Toad Prince
126.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
126.ability: Deploy (Melee): Consume a unit with 4 or less power.
126.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Consume a unit with 4 or less power.
126.flavor: Big, bad, ugly. Squats in the sewers.

127.name: Celaeno Harpy
127.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
127.ability:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit.
Bonded: Spawn a Harpy egg in this row.
127.abilityHTML: Deploy: Consume an allied unit. Bonded: Spawn a Harpy egg in this row.
127.flavor: Common harpies feed on carrion. Celaeno harpies… they feed on dreams.

128.name: Old Speartip: Asleep
128.keywordsHTML: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.

129.name: Katakan
129.keywordsHTML: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
129.ability:
Thrive. 
Deploy: Spawn an Ekimmara and Summon it to this row.
Deathwish: Repeat the Deploy ability.
129.abilityHTML: Thrive. Deploy: Spawn an Ekimmara and Summon it to this row. Deathwish: Repeat the Deploy ability.
129.flavor: Drinking the blood of the Continent since the Conjunction.

130.name: Foglet
130.keywordsHTML: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Fog: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the lowest power unit in this row by 2.
130.ability: Deathwish: Spawn Fog on the opposite row for 3 turns.
130.abilityHTML: Deathwish: Spawn Fog on the opposite row for 3 turns.
130.flavor: Fog creeps on little cat feet. Foglets creep over the bodies of their victims.

131.name: Ancient Foglet
131.keywordsHTML: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
131.ability:
Veil.
Deploy: Boost self by the total duration of row effects on the opposite side.
Whenever you apply a row effect, boost self by its duration.
131.abilityHTML: Veil. Deploy: Boost self by the total duration of row effects on the opposite side. Whenever you apply a row effect, boost self by its duration.
131.flavor: Many primal fears lurk in the hearts of men. The fear of the mist is well–founded…

132.name: Wyvern
132.keywordsHTML: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
132.ability:
Thrive.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
132.abilityHTML: Thrive. Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
132.flavor: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.

133.name: Drone
133.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
133.flavor: Ugly – nature's way of saying stay away.

134.name: Nekker
134.keywordsHTML: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
134.ability:
Thrive.
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit and Summon it to this row.
134.abilityHTML: Thrive. Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit and Summon it to this row.
134.flavor: These little guys are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.

135.name: Ghoul
135.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
135.ability: Deploy (Melee): Consume a bronze unit in your graveyard.
135.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Consume a bronze unit in your graveyard.
135.flavor: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life… then it's one vicious circle.

136.name: Griffin
136.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
136.ability: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit on this row. If there are no targets, destroy self.
136.abilityHTML: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit on this row. If there are no targets, destroy self.
136.flavor: Griffins like to toy with their prey. Eat 'em alive, piece by piece.

137.name: Vran Warrior
137.ability: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, boost self by 1.
137.abilityHTML: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, boost self by 1.
137.flavor: They sat still on their horses, seemingly relaxed. He saw their weapons – short spears with wide tips. Swords with oddly forged guards. Battle axes. Toothed gisarmes.

138.name: Wild Hunt Warrior
138.keywordsHTML: Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
138.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Dominance: Damage it by 3 instead.
138.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Dominance: Damage it by 3 instead.

139.name: Wild Hunt Rider
139.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
139.ability: Deploy, Dominance: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
139.abilityHTML: Deploy, Dominance: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
139.flavor: First the buffalo horns atop their helms penetrate one's view, then the crest betwixt them, and finally the skull–like face exposed beneath their visors.

140.name: Predatory Dive
140.ability: Each player destroys their lowest unit.
140.abilityHTML: Each player destroys their lowest unit.
140.flavor: Afraid for their lives, the residents of Hengfors cowered behind thick city walls. A lot of good that did them...

141.name: Ekimmara
141.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
141.flavor: Me? 'Fraid o' some ploughin' eki-what's-it? Why, it's just an overgrown bat!

142.name: Drowner
142.keywordsHTML: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
142.ability:
Thrive.
Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row and damage it by 2.
142.abilityHTML: Thrive. Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row and damage it by 2.
142.flavor: Though the witchman lusts for gold, for the smiting of a drowner thou shalt give him but a silver penny, or three halfpence, at most.

143.name: Harpy
143.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
143.flavor: There are many species of harpy, and all are kleptomaniacs.

144.name: Harpy Egg
144.keywordsHTML: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
144.ability: Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy and Summon it to this row.
144.abilityHTML: Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy and Summon it to this row.
144.flavor: A harpy egg omelet - a delicious delicacy, good sir. Quite dear, too, for as you might surmise, the wretches don't part with their eggs willingly.

145.name: Wild Hunt Hound
145.keywordsHTML: Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
145.ability: Dominance: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
145.abilityHTML: Dominance: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
145.flavor: Cry 'Havoc!', and let slip the dogs of war.

146.name: Wolf Pack
146.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
146.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
146.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
146.flavor: Relax, I know how to tame wolves…– Dunbar the Hunter's last words.

147.name: Enraged Ifrit
147.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
147.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 4.
147.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 4.
147.flavor: A certain mage thought them cute. It was his fate that gave rise to the saying Don't play with fire…

148.name: Frenzied D'ao
148.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
148.ability: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
148.abilityHTML: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
148.flavor: They're easily mistaken for rocks. Many a troll's been unpleasantly surprised by gastric grief on that very account.

149.name: Maerolorn
149.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
149.ability: Deploy: Trigger a bronze allied unit's Deathwish ability.
149.abilityHTML: Deploy: Trigger a bronze allied unit's Deathwish ability.
149.flavor: No gate nor wall can stop them. Just one tiny crack — that's all they need...

150.name: Imperial Golem
150.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
150.ability: Deploy: Reveal the top unit from your opponent's deck and damage self by its power, then shuffle it back.
150.abilityHTML: Deploy: Reveal the top unit from your opponent's deck and damage self by its power, then shuffle it back.
150.flavor: The most powerful of Nilfgaard's mages have mastered the art of creating golems. On a few occasions, they've even managed to make them fight for the imperial cause…

151.name: Old Speartip
151.flavor: Oh, you're in a heap of trouble now…

152.name: Hideous Feast
152.ability: Damage an enemy unit by 3 and boost an allied unit by 3.
152.abilityHTML: Damage an enemy unit by 3 and boost an allied unit by 3.
152.flavor: The fool paid heed to superstition, stuffed his ears with wax and didn't hear the warnings. He ran his ship straight into the rocks.

153.name: Wyvern Scale Shield
153.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
153.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 1.
Charge: 4. 
Limit 1 Charge per turn.
153.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Boost an allied unit by 1. Charge: 4. Limit 1 Charge per turn.
153.flavor: Stronger than your average shield and far more stylish.

154.name: Arachas Nest
154.keywordsHTML: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
154.ability: Spawn 4 Drones in an allied row.
154.abilityHTML: Spawn 4 Drones in an allied row.
154.flavor: Damn, the filth's o'errun us… We need a witcher or there's no livin' 'ere!

155.name: Saesenthessis
155.keywordsHTML: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
155.ability:
Immunity.
Order: Remove this unit's Immunity until the start of your next turn.
155.abilityHTML: Immunity. Order: Remove this unit's Immunity until the start of your next turn.
155.flavor: I inherited my father's ability to assume other forms - well, one other form, in my case.

156.name: Isengrim Faoiltiarna
156.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
156.ability:
Deploy: Boost all other allied Elf units by 1.
Whenever you play an Elf, boost self by 1.
156.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost all other allied Elf units by 1. Whenever you play an Elf, boost self by 1.
156.flavor: It dawns on them once they notice my scar: a realization of imminent death.

157.name: Iorveth
157.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
157.ability: Deploy: Return an allied Trap to your hand, then play a Trap.
157.abilityHTML: Deploy: Return an allied Trap to your hand, then play a Trap.
157.flavor: King or beggar, what's the difference? One dh'oine less.

158.name: Milva
158.keywordsHTML: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
158.ability:
Immunity.
Boost self by 1 whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit.
158.abilityHTML: Immunity. Boost self by 1 whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit.
158.flavor: With each arrow I loose, I think of my da. He'd be proud. I think.

159.name: Zoltan Chivay
159.keywordsHTML: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
159.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Boost adjacent Dwarves by 2.
159.abilityHTML: Resilience. Deploy: Boost adjacent Dwarves by 2.
159.flavor: Drinkin' alone's like crappin' with company.

160.name: Aglaïs
160.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
160.ability: Deploy: On turn end, double the amount of boosts on self.
160.abilityHTML: Deploy: On turn end, double the amount of boosts on self.
160.flavor: Brokilon bleeds… and not even I can heal it.

161.name: Ithlinne Aegli
161.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
161.ability: Deploy: Boost a Scoia'tael unit in your hand by 4.
161.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost a Scoia'tael unit in your hand by 4.
161.flavor: Famed for constantly prophesying the world's doom. Not much fun at parties.

162.name: Schirrú
162.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
162.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Destroy self and all other units with the same power.
162.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Destroy self and all other units with the same power.
162.flavor: Time to look death in the face.

163.name: Dennis Cranmer
163.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
163.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Boost adjacent units by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units on this row by 1.
163.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Boost adjacent units by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units on this row by 1.
163.flavor: I know how to execute orders, so take your advice somewhere else.

164.name: Ida Emean aep Sivney
164.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Purify: Remove all statuses. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
164.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Purify a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality for 3 turns.
164.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Purify a unit. Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality for 3 turns.
164.flavor: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.

165.name: Yaevinn
165.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by the number of Elf units in this row.
165.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by the number of Elf units in this row.
165.flavor: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.

166.name: Toruviel
166.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
166.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage enemy units at both ends of a row by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage all units on an enemy row by 1.
166.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage enemy units at both ends of a row by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Damage all units on an enemy row by 1.
166.flavor: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes… But you reek, human.

167.name: Vrihedd Dragoon
167.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
167.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Move an enemy unit to their other row.
Deploy (Ranged): Move an allied unit to your other row.
167.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Move an enemy unit to their other row. Deploy (Ranged): Move an allied unit to your other row.
167.flavor: Most terrible things I've witnessed? The Catriona plague, the razing of Vengerberg and the charge of the Vrihedd Dragoons.

168.name: Ciaran aep Easnillen
168.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
168.ability: Deploy: Lock a unit and move it to the other row.
168.abilityHTML: Deploy: Lock a unit and move it to the other row.
168.flavor: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.

169.name: Barclay Els
169.ability: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by the number of Dwarf units in this row.
169.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by the number of Dwarf units in this row.
169.flavor: Our mead smells rotten to ye, do it? Easy to fix – I'll break yer nose!

170.name: Morenn
170.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
170.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Lock a unit.
170.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Lock a unit.
170.flavor: Lady Eithné's daughter had inherited her sublime beauty and her wild hatred for all that is human.

171.name: Braenn
171.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
171.ability:
Deploy: If you control 2 or more other Dryads, gain Zeal.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Charge: 3.
171.abilityHTML: Deploy: If you control 2 or more other Dryads, gain Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Charge: 3.
171.flavor: Mona…? No… no. I'm Braenn. A daughter of Brokilon.

172.name: Malena
172.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
172.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Move a unit to the other row.
Cooldown: 1.
172.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Move a unit to the other row. Cooldown: 1.
172.flavor: I hate you, dh'oine. You are all the same.

173.name: Aelirenn
173.keywordsHTML: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
173.ability: At the end of your turn, if you control 5 or more Elves, Summon  this unit from your deck to your Melee row.
173.abilityHTML: At the end of your turn, if you control 5 or more Elves, Summon this unit from your deck to your Melee row.
173.flavor: Better to die standing than to live on bent knee.

174.name: Sheldon Skaggs
174.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
174.ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by the amount Sheldon is boosted.
174.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by the amount Sheldon is boosted.
174.flavor: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!

175.name: Yarpen Zigrin
175.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
175.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, lose Armor and boost self by that much.
175.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3. Barricade: At the end of your turn, lose Armor and boost self by that much.
175.flavor: Ever hear o' the dragon Ocvist? From Quartz Mountain? Well, Yarpen Zigrin and his band o' dwarves did 'im in.

176.name: Ele'yas
176.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
176.ability: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit, then Spawn 2 Elven Deadeyes in this row.
176.abilityHTML: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit, then Spawn 2 Elven Deadeyes in this row.
176.flavor: Love justifies madness in any of its forms.

177.name: Hawker Healer
177.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
177.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Boost an allied unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 4.
177.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Boost an allied unit by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 4.
177.flavor: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you though.

178.name: Vrihedd Brigade
178.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
178.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Whenever moved, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
178.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Whenever moved, damage a random enemy unit by 2.

179.name: Vrihedd Officer
179.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
179.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 2.
Bonded: Use both abilities.
179.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 2. Bonded: Use both abilities.
179.flavor: Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.

180.name: Dol Blathanna Bomber
180.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
180.ability: Deploy: Damage 2 random enemy units by 2.
180.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage 2 random enemy units by 2.
180.flavor: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like heartless demons.

181.name: Dwarven Skirmisher
181.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
181.ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3. If it survived, boost self by 2.
181.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3. If it survived, boost self by 2.
181.flavor: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.

182.name: Mahakam Defender
182.ability: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost self by 1 if this unit is boosted.
182.abilityHTML: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost self by 1 if this unit is boosted.
182.flavor: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle – we slash straight at their knees!

183.name: Vrihedd Sappers
183.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Purify: Remove all statuses.
183.ability:
Deploy: Purify an allied unit.
If you control an Elf, Purify any unit instead.
183.abilityHTML: Deploy: Purify an allied unit. If you control an Elf, Purify any unit instead.
183.flavor: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.

184.name: Waylay
184.keywordsHTML: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
184.ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Deathblow: Spawn an Elven Deadeye in a random row.
184.abilityHTML: Damage an enemy unit by 3. Deathblow: Spawn an Elven Deadeye in a random row.
184.flavor: I spit on Scoia'tael ideals, but not on their coin.

185.name: Vrihedd Vanguard
185.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
185.ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Elf in your hand.
