185.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Elf in your hand.
185.flavor: Temerians, Redanians, all the same. Better off dead.

186.name: Dol Blathanna Archer
186.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
186.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage 2 units by 1.
186.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Damage 2 units by 1.
186.flavor: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.

187.name: Dwarven Mercenary
187.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
187.ability: Deploy: Damage self by 1 for each non-Dwarf unit in your hand.
187.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage self by 1 for each non-Dwarf unit in your hand.
187.flavor: The key's mixin' pleasure an' business – like smackin' foes and gettin' coin for it.

188.name: Hawker Support
188.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
188.ability: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 1. If you control an artifact, boost by 3 instead.
188.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 1. If you control an artifact, boost by 3 instead.
188.flavor: Elf, dwarf, makes no difference – long as they've got coin.

189.name: Elven Wardancer
189.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
189.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If Elven Wardancer is already boosted, damage an enemy unit by 3 instead.
189.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If Elven Wardancer is already boosted, damage an enemy unit by 3 instead.
189.flavor: You mean to say the she–elf danced amidst the fray? Have you lost your mind, corporal?!

190.name: Dol Blathanna Bowman
190.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
190.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each row that separates it from this unit.
190.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each row that separates it from this unit.
190.flavor: You might manage to hide from them, but once spotted, don't bother trying to run.

191.name: Hawker Smuggler
191.keywordsHTML: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
191.ability: Melee: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost a random unit in your hand by 1.
191.abilityHTML: Melee: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost a random unit in your hand by 1.
191.flavor: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.

192.name: Blue Mountain Elite
192.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
192.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 3 if it is the only unit on its row.
192.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 3 if it is the only unit on its row.
192.flavor: By the time we'd heard them, it was already too late…

193.name: Mahakam Guard
193.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
193.ability: Deploy: Boost self by the number of allied Dwarf units on this row.
193.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost self by the number of allied Dwarf units on this row.
193.flavor: Only one punishment for disturbin' the peace in Mahakam: a hammer to the heid.

194.name: Scoia'tael Neophyte
194.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
194.ability:
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit on the other row.
Order: Transform an allied Elf into Elven Deadeye.
194.abilityHTML: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit on the other row. Order: Transform an allied Elf into Elven Deadeye.
194.flavor: Many nonhumans, fed up with the racism and xenophobia they encounter in the cities, decide to join the Scoia'tael.

195.name: Serpent Trap
195.keywordsHTML: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Spring: An ability triggered manually by the player only when the card is face-down. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
195.ability:
Ambush: After your opponent plays a special card, destroy the enemy unit with the highest power.
Spring: Destroy the enemy unit with the lowest power.
195.abilityHTML: Ambush: After your opponent plays a special card, destroy the enemy unit with the highest power. Spring: Destroy the enemy unit with the lowest power.
195.flavor: You exact from the earth a blood ransom, ripping out its riches by force. To us it bloomed, bore fruit and gave freely, for it loved us as we loved it.

196.name: Incinerating Trap
196.keywordsHTML: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met.
196.ability:
Spring: Damage a unit by 3.
Ambush: Damage the next unit your opponent plays on their side by 5.
196.abilityHTML: Spring: Damage a unit by 3. Ambush: Damage the next unit your opponent plays on their side by 5.
196.flavor: Careful…! One more step and you'll be turned into molten glass.

197.name: Hjalmar an Craite
197.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
197.ability: Deploy (Melee): Banish a unit in your graveyard and damage an enemy unit by its power.
197.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Banish a unit in your graveyard and damage an enemy unit by its power.
197.flavor: Instead of mournin' the fallen, let's drink to their memory!

198.name: Ermion
198.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
198.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Play an Alchemy card from your deck.
198.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Play an Alchemy card from your deck.
198.flavor: Only the ignorant dismiss the importance of myths.

199.name: Kambi
199.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
199.ability: Deploy: Discard the rightmost card in your hand, then your opponent Discards the rightmost card in their hand.
199.abilityHTML: Deploy: Discard the rightmost card in your hand, then your opponent Discards the rightmost card in their hand.
199.flavor: When the time comes, the cockerel Kambi shall crow and awaken Hemdall.

200.name: Birna Bran
200.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
200.ability: Deploy: Draw up to 2 cards, then Discard the same number of cards.
200.abilityHTML: Deploy: Draw up to 2 cards, then Discard the same number of cards.
200.flavor: Skellige must have a strong king. No matter what it takes.

201.name: Madman Lugos
201.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
201.ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by twice the number of damaged enemies.
201.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by twice the number of damaged enemies.

202.name: Coral
202.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
202.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Draw a card, then Discard a card.
Whenever you Discard a card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
202.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Draw a card, then Discard a card. Whenever you Discard a card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
202.flavor: Her true name's Astrid Lyttneyd Ásgeirrfinnbjornsdottir, but that never fit on any forms.

203.name: Wild Boar of the Sea
203.keywordsHTML: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
203.ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage all damaged enemy units by 1, then damage all enemy units by 1.
203.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage all damaged enemy units by 1, then damage all enemy units by 1.
203.flavor: Merely mention this name to a Nilfgaardian, and they'll feel a spreading warmth in their knickers…

204.name: Blueboy Lugos
204.ability: Whenever this unit takes damage, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
204.abilityHTML: Whenever this unit takes damage, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
204.flavor: I'm near ready to puke from boredom.

205.name: Champion's Charge
205.keywordsHTML: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
205.ability:
Damage a unit by 5. 
Bloodthirst 3: Destroy a unit instead.
205.abilityHTML: Damage a unit by 5. Bloodthirst 3: Destroy a unit instead.
205.flavor: At close range, trolls never use weapons. And why would they?

206.name: Djenge Frett
206.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
206.ability: Deploy, Bloodthirst 1: Lock an enemy unit.
206.abilityHTML: Deploy, Bloodthirst 1: Lock an enemy unit.
206.flavor: When a warrant says dead or alive, most bounty hunters'll just kill you. Not me. Should I catch you, you'll hang, and I'll tickle your feet as you expire.

207.name: Donar an Hindar
207.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
207.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Bloodthirst 2: Damage an enemy unit by 4 instead.
207.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Bloodthirst 2: Damage an enemy unit by 4 instead.
207.flavor: I've gathered all the jarls together. Now make your case.

208.name: Draig Bon-Dhu
208.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
208.ability: Deploy: Boost all allied Warrior units by 1.
208.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost all allied Warrior units by 1.
208.flavor: Hear ye now the tale of the heroic deeds of Clan an Craite.

209.name: Gremist
209.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Purify: Remove all statuses.
209.ability:
Zeal. Order (Ranged): Purify a unit.
Refresh this ability whenever you play an Alchemy card.
209.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order (Ranged): Purify a unit. Refresh this ability whenever you play an Alchemy card.
209.flavor: An archdruid, a master of alchemy, and the grumpiest old fart in the Isles.

210.name: Holger Blackhand
210.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
210.ability:
Deploy: Damage a unit by 2.
Whenever you play a ship, boost it by 1.
Whenever you play a pirate, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
210.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage a unit by 2. Whenever you play a ship, boost it by 1. Whenever you play a pirate, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
210.flavor: Now let's drink to the Emperor of Nilfgaard – may he die of somethin' hideous!

211.name: Jutta an Dimun
211.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
211.ability: Deploy: If Jutta an Dimun is the highest unit, damage self by 6.
211.abilityHTML: Deploy: If Jutta an Dimun is the highest unit, damage self by 6.
211.flavor: Some call her the Iron Maiden.

212.name: Morkvarg
212.keywordsHTML: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
212.ability: When this unit enters your graveyard during the round, Summon it to your Melee row and give it Doomed.
212.abilityHTML: When this unit enters your graveyard during the round, Summon it to your Melee row and give it Doomed.
212.flavor: The vilest man Skellige's ever known.

213.name: Savage Bear
213.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
213.ability:
Zeal.
Deploy: Gain 1 Charge for each Savage Bear in your graveyard.
Order: Give Bleeding 2 to an enemy unit.
Charge: 1.
213.abilityHTML: Zeal. Deploy: Gain 1 Charge for each Savage Bear in your graveyard. Order: Give Bleeding 2 to an enemy unit. Charge: 1.
213.flavor: Tame? Och, lad, Skelligers might train bears, but that don't at all mean they tame 'em…

214.name: Sigrdrifa's Rite
214.keywordsHTML: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
214.ability: Summon a Skellige unit from your graveyard to an allied row and give it Doomed.
214.abilityHTML: Summon a Skellige unit from your graveyard to an allied row and give it Doomed.
214.flavor: Fall on your knees and beg Modron Freya for forgiveness.

215.name: Svanrige Tuirseach
215.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
215.abilityHTML: Deploy, Bloodthirst 3: Boost self by 5.
215.flavor: The emperor also thought him an accidental king. At first.

216.name: Udalryk an Brokvar
216.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
216.ability:
Deploy, Bloodthirst 2: Gain Zeal.
Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charge: 3
216.abilityHTML: Deploy, Bloodthirst 2: Gain Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charge: 3
216.flavor: The gods have spoken: a sacrifice is required.

217.name: Svalblod Ravager
217.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
217.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Bloodthirst 2: Give it Bleeding for 2 turns.
217.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Bloodthirst 2: Give it Bleeding for 2 turns.
217.flavor: A two-handed axe? Seems no one told him that.

218.name: Svalblod Butcher
218.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
218.ability: Deploy: Damage an allied unit by 2, then give an enemy unit Bleeding for 3 turns.
218.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an allied unit by 2, then give an enemy unit Bleeding for 3 turns.
218.flavor: Mercenaries fight for coin. Knights duel for honor. He kills for blood.

219.name: An Craite Warrior
219.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
219.ability: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3). If played from the graveyard, damage an enemy unit by 3 instead.
219.abilityHTML: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3). If played from the graveyard, damage an enemy unit by 3 instead.
219.flavor: Our clan's bards will sing of my deeds long after you're dead and forgotten!

220.name: Brokvar Hunter
220.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
220.ability:
Zeal. Order (Ranged): Damage a unit by 1.
Cooldown: 2.
Whenever you play a Beast, reduce Cooldown by 1.
220.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order (Ranged): Damage a unit by 1. Cooldown: 2. Whenever you play a Beast, reduce Cooldown by 1.
220.flavor: Better believe we can hunt. Thing is, not much game on Spikeroog…

221.name: Dimun Pirate
221.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
221.ability:
Deploy: Move the top card from your deck to your graveyard.
Cancel the ability if you control a Ship.
221.abilityHTML: Deploy: Move the top card from your deck to your graveyard. Cancel the ability if you control a Ship.
221.flavor: Can see the fear in their eyes. Fear o' me… fear o' Clan Dimun!

222.name: Dimun Pirate Captain
222.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Bloodthirst 2: Damage it by 3 instead.
222.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Bloodthirst 2: Damage it by 3 instead.
222.flavor: Haul together, hoist the colors high!

223.name: Drummond Queensguard
223.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
223.ability: Order, Berserk 3: Spawn a base copy of self and Summon it in the same row.
223.abilityHTML: Order, Berserk 3: Spawn a base copy of self and Summon it in the same row.
223.flavor: The queen is guarded by the hardiest and fiercest shieldmaidens Skellige's ever known.

224.name: Heymaey Skald
224.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
224.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Draw a card, then Discard a card.
224.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Draw a card, then Discard a card.
224.flavor: The deeds of Clan Heymaey will go down in history.

225.name: Dimun Light Longship
225.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
225.ability:
Zeal.
Order (Ranged): Damage self and an enemy unit by 1.
Cooldown: 1.
225.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order (Ranged): Damage self and an enemy unit by 1. Cooldown: 1.
225.flavor: Escape them? In the waters of Skellige? Good luck.

226.name: Freya's Blessing
226.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
226.ability: Play a bronze Skellige unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
226.abilityHTML: Play a bronze Skellige unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
226.flavor: Modron Freya, the Great Mother, is the goddess of love, beauty and bounty.

227.name: An Craite Blacksmith
227.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
227.ability:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Warrior.
227.abilityHTML: Order: Boost an allied unit by 1. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Warrior.
227.flavor: Remember me words – a good shield can save yer life.

228.name: Tuirseach Axeman
228.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
228.ability: Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit with half or less than half of its base power.
228.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit with half or less than half of its base power.
228.flavor: Swords are for wenches. Get yourself an axe.

229.name: Tuirseach Skirmisher
229.keywordsHTML: Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
229.ability: When this unit is Discarded, Summon it from your graveyard to your Melee row.
229.abilityHTML: When this unit is Discarded, Summon it from your graveyard to your Melee row.
229.flavor: Friends we show heart, foes we show our axe. Remember that.

230.name: An Craite Longship
230.keywordsHTML: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
230.ability: Melee: Whenever your opponent plays a unit, deal 1 damage to it.
230.abilityHTML: Melee: Whenever your opponent plays a unit, deal 1 damage to it.
230.flavor: They say Hemdall's heart swells whenever the longships sail out on a raid.

231.name: Brokvar Archer
231.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
231.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by the amount of damaged units on their side.
231.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by the amount of damaged units on their side.
231.flavor: So ye can hit a movin' target at two hundred paces? Me, too. In a storm.

232.name: Gutting Slash
232.keywordsHTML: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
232.ability:
Damage a unit by 4. 
Bloodthirst 2: Damage a unit by 6 instead.
232.abilityHTML: Damage a unit by 4. Bloodthirst 2: Damage a unit by 6 instead.
232.flavor: Man or tree, a Skelligan axe fells it all the same.

233.name: An Craite Armorsmith
233.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
233.ability: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 2. If it's damaged, boost it by 4 instead.
233.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 2. If it's damaged, boost it by 4 instead.

234.name: Drummond Shieldmaiden
234.keywordsHTML: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
234.ability: When this unit is damaged, Summon all copies of it from your deck to this row.
234.abilityHTML: When this unit is damaged, Summon all copies of it from your deck to this row.
234.flavor: They'll shatter on our shields like waves on a craggy shore.

235.name: Hemdall
235.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
235.ability: Deploy: Deal 1 damage to random enemy units in a row, multiplied by the number of units in that row.
235.abilityHTML: Deploy: Deal 1 damage to random enemy units in a row, multiplied by the number of units in that row.
235.flavor: When the time of the White Frost comes, Hemdall will sound the call for battle.

236.name: Delirium
236.ability: Split 6 damage randomly between all units on an enemy row.
236.abilityHTML: Split 6 damage randomly between all units on an enemy row.
236.flavor: Ehh, too big for a humpback. That's a finback. A finback? With a snout that short? Those herbs've gone to your head!

237.name: Elder Bear
237.flavor: We're going on a bear hunt! We're going to catch a–– THAT THING'S HUGE! RUN!

238.name: Raging Bear
238.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
238.ability: Deploy: Damage an allied unit by 2.
238.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an allied unit by 2.

239.name: Restore
239.keywordsHTML: Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
239.ability: Heal an allied unit, then boost it by the amount it was healed.
239.abilityHTML: Heal an allied unit, then boost it by the amount it was healed.
239.flavor: Those cursed sorceresses are stealing our thunder! Whyever should folk choose a procedure taking several hours, when some perfumed tart can solve their problem with a wave of her hand?

240.name: Lacerate
240.ability: Damage all units on a row by 2.
240.abilityHTML: Damage all units on a row by 2.
240.flavor: A sight more horrid you've never seen… The poor soul lay shredded as the beast lapped up its blood from the ground all around.

241.name: Letho of Gulet
241.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
241.ability: Deploy: If Auckes is in your hand, Lock an enemy unit. If Serrit is in your hand, damage an enemy unit by 3. If both are in your hand, Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
241.abilityHTML: Deploy: If Auckes is in your hand, Lock an enemy unit. If Serrit is in your hand, damage an enemy unit by 3. If both are in your hand, Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
241.flavor: Witchers never die in their beds.

242.name: Menno Coehoorn
242.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
242.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Play a Tactic card from your deck.
242.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Play a Tactic card from your deck.
242.flavor: I'll take an attentive reconnaissance unit over a fine brigade any day.

243.name: Vattier de Rideaux
243.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
243.ability: Order (Melee): Seize a Locked enemy unit.
243.abilityHTML: Order (Melee): Seize a Locked enemy unit.
243.flavor: There's never been a problem a well–planned assassination couldn't solve.

244.name: Cahir Dyffryn
244.keywordsHTML: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
244.ability: Melee: Whenever an enemy receives a boost, boost self by the same amount.
244.abilityHTML: Melee: Whenever an enemy receives a boost, boost self by the same amount.
244.flavor: His eyes flashed under his winged helmet. Fire gleamed from his sword's blade.

245.name: Vilgefortz
245.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
245.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit, then your opponent Summons the top unit from their deck to a random enemy row.
Deploy (Ranged): Destroy an allied unit, then Summon the top unit from your deck to a random allied row.
245.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit, then your opponent Summons the top unit from their deck to a random enemy row. Deploy (Ranged): Destroy an allied unit, then Summon the top unit from your deck to a random allied row.
245.flavor: We are all pawns on his board. Playing a game whose rules we do not know.

246.name: Stefan Skellen
246.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
246.ability: Order (Ranged): Spawn and play a copy of the last Tactic card you played this round and give it Doomed.
246.abilityHTML: Order (Ranged): Spawn and play a copy of the last Tactic card you played this round and give it Doomed.
246.flavor: My mark scars the face of our future empress. That is my proudest achievement.

247.name: Tibor Eggebracht
247.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
247.ability: Deploy: Your opponent Summons the top unit from their deck to a random enemy row.
247.abilityHTML: Deploy: Your opponent Summons the top unit from their deck to a random enemy row.
247.flavor: Tibor's zeal was legendary. It was said when the emperor passed, he'd not so much bow as somersault.

248.name: Xarthisius
248.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
248.ability: Deploy: Reveal a random card in your deck. If it's a unit, boost self by its power and shuffle it back. If it's an artifact or a special card, play it.
248.abilityHTML: Deploy: Reveal a random card in your deck. If it's a unit, boost self by its power and shuffle it back. If it's an artifact or a special card, play it.
248.flavor: Astrology, hydromancy, haruspicy, ceromancy. Ovomancy, spodomancy, metroscopy, brontoscopy…

249.name: Albrich
249.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
249.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Move any card from your deck to the top. If it's a unit, boost it by 2.
249.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Move any card from your deck to the top. If it's a unit, boost it by 2.
249.flavor: A ball of fire? Why, naturally. Whatsoever Your Imperial Majesty desires.

250.name: Assire var Anahid
250.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
250.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Shuffle a card from the opponent's graveyard into their deck.
Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your graveyard into your deck.
250.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Shuffle a card from the opponent's graveyard into their deck. Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your graveyard into your deck.
250.flavor: Nilfgaardian mages do have a choice: servile submission, or the gallows.

251.name: Cynthia
251.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
251.ability: Deploy (Melee): Spawn The Guardian and place it at the top of your opponent's deck.
251.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Spawn The Guardian and place it at the top of your opponent's deck.
251.flavor: Cynthia's talents can be deadly. She needs a tight leash.

252.name: Peter Saar Gwynleve
252.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
252.ability: Deploy: Reset the power of a unit.
252.abilityHTML: Deploy: Reset the power of a unit.
252.flavor: These are not the hands of an Excellency, but of a farmer. So we speak peasant to peasant.

253.name: Fringilla Vigo
253.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
253.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Increase the number of targets by 1 for each adjacent Mage or Construct.
253.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Increase the number of targets by 1 for each adjacent Mage or Construct.
253.flavor: Magic is the highest good. It transcends all borders and divisions.

254.name: Sweers
254.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
254.ability: Deploy (Melee): Seize an enemy unit with 3 or less power.
254.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Seize an enemy unit with 3 or less power.
254.flavor: And hands off the girl! Whatever we may be, we're not savages.

255.name: Vanhemar
255.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
255.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Destroy a Locked enemy unit.
255.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Destroy a Locked enemy unit.
255.flavor: For a fire mage, he's not very… flamboyant.

256.name: Auckes
256.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
256.ability:
Deploy: Lock an enemy unit.
If Serrit is in your hand, Lock all copies of that unit on the opponent's side.
256.abilityHTML: Deploy: Lock an enemy unit. If Serrit is in your hand, Lock all copies of that unit on the opponent's side.
256.flavor: Letho's got a plan… what could go wrong?

257.name: Serrit
257.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
257.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. If Auckes is in your hand, damage that unit by 4 instead.
257.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. If Auckes is in your hand, damage that unit by 4 instead.
257.flavor: We do what we must. I am not ashamed of that.

258.name: Cantarella
258.keywordsHTML: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
258.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Play the top card from your opponent's deck.
258.abilityHTML: Disloyal. Deploy: Play the top card from your opponent's deck.
258.flavor: Men require constant alluring. Mystique and refinement do the job quite well.

259.name: Joachim de Wett
259.keywordsHTML: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
259.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Play the top non-Disloyal unit from your deck and boost it by 8.
259.abilityHTML: Disloyal. Deploy: Play the top non-Disloyal unit from your deck and boost it by 8.
259.flavor: To describe the manner in which Duke de Wett led the Verden Group as incompetent would be far too kind.

260.name: False Ciri
260.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
260.ability: Deploy: Boost all allied Agents by 1.
260.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost all allied Agents by 1.
260.flavor: Here she comes, he thought, our imperial interest. A mock-princess, a mock-queen for Cintra. A mock-ruler for the mouth of the Yarra, future lifeblood of the empire.

261.name: Ceallach Dyffryn
261.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Purify: Remove all statuses.
261.ability: Deploy: Purify all allied units on this row.
261.abilityHTML: Deploy: Purify all allied units on this row.
261.flavor: Your Imperial Highness… blurted out the seneschal, whose presence until now had been thoroughly ignored. I beg your pardon, but Cahir… My son...

262.name: Daerlan Soldier
262.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
262.ability: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit in this row.
262.abilityHTML: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit in this row.
262.flavor: Learned a lot at Braibant Military Academy. How to scrub potatoes, for instance.

263.name: Rot Tosser
263.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
263.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play a Cow Carcass.
263.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play a Cow Carcass.
263.flavor: Let historians debate whether spreading plague in a besieged city is ethical. We just care if it's effective.

264.name: Spotter
264.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
264.ability: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put one on top, then swap the top card of your opponent's deck with yours.
264.abilityHTML: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put one on top, then swap the top card of your opponent's deck with yours.
264.flavor: The North has nothing with which it could surprise us.

265.name: Experimental Remedy
265.ability: Play a Bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard.
265.abilityHTML: Play a Bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard.
265.flavor: Well... At least, I can't make you more dead...

266.name: Deithwen Arbalest
266.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Conspiracy: Trigger this ability if target unit has Spying status.
266.ability:
Deploy: Give Bleeding 3 to an enemy unit.
Conspiracy: Damage it by 3 instead.
266.abilityHTML: Deploy: Give Bleeding 3 to an enemy unit. Conspiracy: Damage it by 3 instead.
266.flavor: I aim for the knees. Always.

267.name: Fire Scorpion
267.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
267.ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Tactic card.
267.abilityHTML: Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Tactic card.
267.flavor: Name's terribly misleading, makes it sound like some corpulent reddish arachnid, not an exquisitely engineered weapon of mass destruction...

268.name: Impera Brigade
268.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
268.ability: Deploy: If you control a Soldier, Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
268.abilityHTML: Deploy: If you control a Soldier, Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
268.flavor: The Impera Brigade never surrenders. Ever.

269.name: Impera Enforcers
269.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
269.ability:
Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Charge: 1.
Whenever an enemy unit gains Spying, gain 1 Charge.
269.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Charge: 1. Whenever an enemy unit gains Spying, gain 1 Charge.
269.flavor: Members of the emperor's fanatic body guard fight to the bitter end.

270.name: Nauzicaa Sergeant
270.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
270.ability: Whenever you play a unit with Deploy, boost self by 1.
270.abilityHTML: Whenever you play a unit with Deploy, boost self by 1.
270.flavor: The Emperor will teach the North discipline.

271.name: Nauzicaa Brigade
271.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
271.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
If the enemy unit is boosted, damage it by 3 instead.
271.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If the enemy unit is boosted, damage it by 3 instead.
271.flavor: They call us Death's Heads. Care to find out why?

272.name: Alba Pikeman
272.keywordsHTML: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
272.ability:
Melee: At the end of your turn, damage a random enemy unit on the Melee row by 1.
Bonded: Damage a random enemy unit by 1 instead.
272.abilityHTML: Melee: At the end of your turn, damage a random enemy unit on the Melee row by 1. Bonded: Damage a random enemy unit by 1 instead.
272.flavor: Pledge your allegiance to our Emperor, Emhyr var Emreis… or die.

273.name: Alba Spearman
273.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
273.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Increase the damage by 1 for each adjacent Soldier.
273.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Increase the damage by 1 for each adjacent Soldier.

274.name: Combat Engineer
274.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
274.ability: Deploy: If you control an artifact, boost self by 3.
274.abilityHTML: Deploy: If you control an artifact, boost self by 3.
274.flavor: Want irrefutable proof of civilization's advance? Look at war. Man gets better at killing with each one.

275.name: Emissary
275.keywordsHTML: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
275.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Boost an ally by 7.
275.abilityHTML: Disloyal. Deploy: Boost an ally by 7.
275.flavor: But… but there's no justice in it! One does not kill the messenger!

276.name: Imperial Diplomacy
276.keywordsHTML: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
276.ability: Create and play a bronze card from your opponent's faction.
276.abilityHTML: Create and play a bronze card from your opponent's faction.
276.flavor: A spy? No, that's saying far too much. I consider myself more of an observer.

277.name: Alchemist
277.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
277.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Swap the power of 2 allied units.
277.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Swap the power of 2 allied units.
277.flavor: Two ounces of calcium equum, one ounce of rubedo…

278.name: Mangonel
278.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
278.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 1. For every Spying unit adjacent to it, increase the damage by 2.
278.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 1. For every Spying unit adjacent to it, increase the damage by 2.
278.flavor: This model specializes in slinging corpses and ripe dung.

279.name: Nilfgaardian Knight
279.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
279.ability: Deploy: Boost an enemy unit by 2.
279.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost an enemy unit by 2.
279.flavor: Sons of noble houses, born in the City of the Golden Towers, form the elite backbone of the Imperial Army.

280.name: The Guardian
280.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
280.flavor: Stone fists to stop intruders armed with swords. Ironclad logic to stop those armed with lies.

281.name: Cow Carcass
281.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield. Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
281.ability: Doomed. Disloyal. At the end of your turn Poison adjacent units and destroy self.
281.abilityHTML: Doomed. Disloyal. At the end of your turn Poison adjacent units and destroy self.
281.flavor: That a bird? That a griffin? Naye! That's a…

282.name: Treason
282.keywordsHTML: Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
282.ability: Give Spying to an enemy unit and damage adjacent units by its power.
282.abilityHTML: Give Spying to an enemy unit and damage adjacent units by its power.
282.flavor: In Nilfgaard, trustful people are considered an endangered species.

283.name: Bribery
283.keywordsHTML: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
283.ability: Create and play a unit from your opponent's starting deck.
283.abilityHTML: Create and play a unit from your opponent's starting deck.
283.flavor: Many believe the empire's power rests upon the shoulders of its disciplined army and dutiful mages. In truth, the Nilfgaardian floren rules the world.

284.name: Petri's Philter
284.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
284.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 3 and give it Zeal.
284.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Boost an allied unit by 3 and give it Zeal.
284.flavor: A mage responsible for dozens of brilliant inventions. The mind of a generation. Commonly referred to around the Continent as that bloke with the dish.

285.name: Korathi Heatwave
285.keywordsHTML: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
285.ability: Banish a unit or an artifact.
285.abilityHTML: Banish a unit or an artifact.
285.flavor: Vicovaro scholars have determined that, in the absence of imperial aid, drought-stricken provinces lose half their population, two-thirds of their livestock and all their will to rebel.

286.name: Marching Orders
286.ability: Play the lowest unit from your deck.
286.abilityHTML: Play the lowest unit from your deck.
286.flavor: We are but pawns in a game played by old men, sent to fight and die on their senile whims…

287.name: Necromancy
287.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
287.ability: Play a bronze unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
287.abilityHTML: Play a bronze unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
287.flavor: We have ways of making you talk… alive or dead.

288.name: Summoning Circle
288.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
288.ability: Deploy: Create and play a bronze unit from any faction.
288.abilityHTML: Deploy: Create and play a bronze unit from any faction.
288.flavor: There exist a great many realities outside our own… With the right knowledge, one can contact them and summon beings beyond human fathoming.

289.name: Arachas Venom
289.keywordsHTML: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
289.ability:
Damage a unit by 3.
Deathblow: Damage adjacent units by 3.
289.abilityHTML: Damage a unit by 3. Deathblow: Damage adjacent units by 3.
289.flavor: If substance makes contact with eyes, rinse immediately with cold water, then commence drawing up will.

290.name: Wild Hunt Navigator
290.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
290.ability:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 1.
Dominance: Boost it by 3 instead.
290.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 1. Dominance: Boost it by 3 instead.
290.flavor: For hundreds of years, Avallac'h tried to recreate the Elder Blood gene through back breeding - yet the elven children thus fostered were but dim sparks compared to Lara's flame.

291.name: Vabjorn
291.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
291.ability: Deploy (Melee): Play a Raid card from your deck.
291.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Play a Raid card from your deck.
291.flavor: Blood for Svalblod! Skulls for his throne!

292.name: Milaen
292.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
292.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 4.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage 4 enemy units by 1.
292.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 4. Deploy (Ranged): Damage 4 enemy units by 1.
292.flavor: The old baron treated poachers mercilessly. Luckily for Milaen, the old baron was dead and his men, desperate outlaws.

293.name: Leo Bonhart
293.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
293.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
Deploy (Ranged): Destroy an enemy Witcher.
293.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power. Deploy (Ranged): Destroy an enemy Witcher.
293.flavor: He would just sit there and stare at me, not saying a word. His eyes, they were… fish-like, somehow. No brows, no lashes… Just these balls of water, with a black stone sunk in each. He would devour me with those eyes in total silence. That frightened me more than the beatings.

294.name: Rainfarn of Attre
294.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Conspiracy: Trigger this ability if target unit has Spying status.
294.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Conspiracy: Increase damage by 2.
294.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Conspiracy: Increase damage by 2.
294.flavor: When Cintra fell, Attre followed, leaving its defenders a choice: accept the Nilfgaardian leash or die.

295.name: Aretuza Adept
295.keywordsHTML: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
295.ability: Whenever an allied unit's Patience is triggered, boost self by 1.
295.abilityHTML: Whenever an allied unit's Patience is triggered, boost self by 1.
295.flavor: The adepts' every whim is catered to - they live like princesses at Aretuza. And in turn half the city lives off servicing them: seamstresses, milliners, confectioners, delivery boys…

296.name: Drummond Warmonger
296.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
296.ability:
Deploy: Damage 3 adjacent enemies by 1.
Bloodthirst 5: Damage all enemies on a row by 1 instead.
296.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage 3 adjacent enemies by 1. Bloodthirst 5: Damage all enemies on a row by 1 instead.
296.flavor: Think o' the greater good?! War's the greatest good, the greatest bad, the greatest damn anythin' man's ever come up with!

297.name: Cyclops
297.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
297.ability: Deploy: Destroy an adjacent ally unit and deal its power as damage to an enemy.
297.abilityHTML: Deploy: Destroy an adjacent ally unit and deal its power as damage to an enemy.
297.flavor: Don't stare at his eye, he hates that…

298.name: Archespore
298.keywordsHTML: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
298.ability: Deathwish: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
298.abilityHTML: Deathwish: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
298.flavor: Folklore claims they sprout from soil watered with the blood of the dying. Thus they flourish in grounds consecrated by pogroms, dark rituals or brutal murders.

299.name: Dol Blathanna Sentry
299.keywordsHTML: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
299.ability:
Melee: Whenever an enemy unit moves, damage it by 1.
Ranged: Whenever an allied unit moves, boost it by 1.
299.abilityHTML: Melee: Whenever an enemy unit moves, damage it by 1. Ranged: Whenever an allied unit moves, boost it by 1.
299.flavor: As long as we stand, no human foot shall trample Dol Blathanna's meadows.

300.name: An Craite Greatsword
300.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
300.ability:
Deploy: Damage self by 6.
Whenever an enemy unit takes damage, Heal self by 1.
300.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage self by 6. Whenever an enemy unit takes damage, Heal self by 1.
300.flavor: Ahh, ye gave me a good laugh there, Nordling! Why, this bastard, ye couldn't even grip it, let alone gut me with it.

301.name: Hefty Helge
301.keywordsHTML: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
301.ability:
Shield.
Order: Damage a unit by 2.
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Tactic.
301.abilityHTML: Shield. Order: Damage a unit by 2. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Tactic.
301.flavor: Not the best for taking cities, but great for razing them to the ground.

302.name: Mahakam Marauder
302.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
302.ability:
Deploy: Gain Vitality for 2 turns.
Bonded: Gain Vitality for 4 turns.
302.abilityHTML: Deploy: Gain Vitality for 2 turns. Bonded: Gain Vitality for 4 turns.
302.flavor: Hunting on Mahakam's craggy cliffs is not particularly easy… but nor are dwarves particularly put off by danger.

303.name: Harald Houndsnout
303.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
303.ability:
Deploy: Spawn 3 of Harald's Pals and Summon them to your other allied row.
Order: Damage an allied unit by 1.
Cooldown: 1.
303.abilityHTML: Deploy: Spawn 3 of Harald's Pals and Summon them to your other allied row. Order: Damage an allied unit by 1. Cooldown: 1.
303.flavor: Once proud jarl of Clan Tordarroch, now a muttering madman.

304.name: Magne Division
304.keywordsHTML: Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
304.ability:
At turn end, boost self by 1 if this is the only card on the row.
Bonded: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 instead.
304.abilityHTML: At turn end, boost self by 1 if this is the only card on the row. Bonded: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 instead.
304.flavor: I know the Emperor defends all his lands... but a garrison in this blasted waste is like a chastity belt on a grave hag.

305.name: Tuirseach Veteran
305.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
305.ability:
Deploy: Damage self by 3.
Berserk 3: Heal self.
305.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage self by 3. Berserk 3: Heal self.
305.flavor: In my days I've seen wonders no man's ever dreamt of, and done things no man should ever do.

306.name: Ban Ard Tutor
306.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
306.ability: Deploy: Boost an allied Mage by 4.
306.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost an allied Mage by 4.
306.flavor: I'm constantly comparing the achievements of Aretuza's adepts with the work done by the lads at Ban Ard, and my conclusion constantly falls in favor of the girls.

307.name: Battering Ram
307.keyword: deploy, crew, zeal, order, melee, ranged, cooldown
307.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
307.ability:
Deploy, Crew: Gain Zeal.
Order (Melee): Move self to the Ranged row.
Order (Ranged): Move self to the Melee row, then damage the highest enemy unit by 3.
Cooldown: 2.
307.abilityHTML: Deploy, Crew: Gain Zeal. Order (Melee): Move self to the Ranged row. Order (Ranged): Move self to the Melee row, then damage the highest enemy unit by 3. Cooldown: 2.
307.flavor: Not gonna open up, eh? Guess we gotta knock harder.

308.name: Vreemde
308.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
308.ability: Deploy: Boost an allied Soldier and all copies of it by 2.
308.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost an allied Soldier and all copies of it by 2.
308.flavor: The Great Sun shall warm the North with its rays, even if it means I must slaughter you all!

309.name: Golyat
309.keywordsHTML: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
309.ability: Deathwish: Your opponent Summons the highest unit from their deck on the opposite row.
309.abilityHTML: Deathwish: Your opponent Summons the highest unit from their deck on the opposite row.
309.flavor: Some claim Golyat was once a famous knight. Sadly, one day he earned the wrath of the Lady of the Lake, who turned him into a monster.

310.name: Artefact Compression
310.keywordsHTML: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
310.ability: Reset power of a unit and Lock it.
310.abilityHTML: Reset power of a unit and Lock it.
310.flavor: The figurine expanded in a flash, pulsing and throbbing, changing its shape and structure like a puff of smoke crawling over the floor. Beams of light revealed movement and hardening materials. A moment later, in the center of the magic circle a human form suddenly appeared.

311.name: White Frost
311.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
311.ability:
Order: Move an enemy unit to the other row and Spawn Frost on its row for 2 turns. Charge: 2
Whenever you play a Wild Hunt unit, boost it by 1 if there's Frost in the opposite row.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
311.abilityHTML: Order: Move an enemy unit to the other row and Spawn Frost on its row for 2 turns. Charge: 2 Whenever you play a Wild Hunt unit, boost it by 1 if there's Frost in the opposite row. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
311.flavor: No one, not even among the higher vampires, knows exactly how old the Unseen Elder is. They only know they should never, under any circumstances, defy his will.

312.name: Aguara: True Form
312.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
312.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a special card from any faction.
312.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a special card from any faction.
312.flavor: Ever heard of an anterion? Think of it as the opposite of a lycanthrope: a beast which can take on human form.

313.name: Uma's Curse
313.keywordsHTML: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
313.ability: Create and play a gold unit from any faction.
313.abilityHTML: Create and play a gold unit from any faction.
313.flavor: I give you three solid leads, trails as fresh as morning dew, the aid of my spies and my court sorceress. Yet in my daughter's stead, you bring me this… monstrosity?

314.name: Aguara
314.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
314.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Lock a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Remove a unit's Lock.
314.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Lock a unit. Deploy (Ranged): Remove a unit's Lock.
314.flavor: Smarten up right now, or it's off to an aguara with you!

315.name: Shilard Fitz-Oesterlen
315.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
315.ability: Deploy: Set the power of the highest unit in your opponent's hand to 1.
315.abilityHTML: Deploy: Set the power of the highest unit in your opponent's hand to 1.
315.flavor: A diplomat is a man who uses many more words than necessary to express much less than he knows.

316.name: Adda: Striga
316.keywordsHTML: Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
316.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Dominance: Damage it by 4 instead.
316.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Dominance: Damage it by 4 instead.
316.flavor: And the striga's doin' fine. Sure, she takes a bite outta someone from time to time, but you get used to that.

317.name: Trial of the Grasses
317.ability: Set a unit's power to 12. If it's not a Witcher, damage it by 6 first.
317.abilityHTML: Set a unit's power to 12. If it's not a Witcher, damage it by 6 first.
317.flavor: Imagine a lump of clay. In order to shape it, you must first moisten it or it will crumble. The Trial's initial part does just that. It opens the body to change, so to speak. Only then can the mutagens produce a witcher.

318.name: Hanmarvyn's Blue Dream
318.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
318.ability: Play a unit from your opponent's graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
318.abilityHTML: Play a unit from your opponent's graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
318.flavor: This spell lets you see the last moments of a dead man's life… if you can survive its casting.

319.name: Xavier Moran
319.keywordsHTML: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
319.ability:
Melee: Whenever you play a Dwarf, gain 1 Armor.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
319.abilityHTML: Melee: Whenever you play a Dwarf, gain 1 Armor. Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
319.flavor: Well? Somethin' wrong? Venison a wee bit rank for ye? Ehh, princess?

320.name: Heymaey Herbalist
320.keywordsHTML: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
320.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 3 and boost it by 3.
320.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 3 and boost it by 3.
320.flavor: We don't burn cunning women in Skellige - we take their advice.

321.name: Iris' Companions
321.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
321.ability:
Deploy: Draw a card of your choice, then Discard a random card.
If you have Iris in hand, choose which card to Discard instead.
321.abilityHTML: Deploy: Draw a card of your choice, then Discard a random card. If you have Iris in hand, choose which card to Discard instead.
321.flavor: We'd rather keep our names to ourselves. Think of us as… friends of the house.

322.name: Dorregaray of Vole
322.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
322.abilityHTML: Deploy: Lock a unit.
322.flavor: Like the witchers, Dorregaray is a monster aficionado, though he's developed his own classification system. Instead of dividing them into necrophages, ogroids and the like, he just thinks they're all wonderful.

323.name: Hubert Rejk
323.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
323.ability:
Whenever you use an Order ability while this card is in your deck, remove a counter from it. When counter reaches 0, Summon this card from your deck to your Ranged row.
Counter: 10.
323.abilityHTML: Whenever you use an Order ability while this card is in your deck, remove a counter from it. When counter reaches 0, Summon this card from your deck to your Ranged row. Counter: 10.
323.flavor: The coroner is a calm, peaceful person. He even treats corpses with the utmost delicacy.

324.name: Nivellen
324.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
324.ability: Deploy: Move 3 adjacent units to the other row.
324.abilityHTML: Deploy: Move 3 adjacent units to the other row.
324.flavor: Lost? Well, go be lost somewhere else. Somewhere not on my property, that is. Point your left ear to the sun and keep walking, you'll hit the road soon enough. Well? What're you waiting for?

325.name: Stregobor
325.keywordsHTML: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
325.ability: Ranged: After 2 allied turns, each player draws a unit and sets its power to 1.
325.abilityHTML: Ranged: After 2 allied turns, each player draws a unit and sets its power to 1.
325.flavor: The witcher had met thieves that looked like town councilors, town councilors that looked like beggars and kings that looked like thieves. Stregobor, though, always looked exactly like the commonly accepted imagining of what a mage should look like.

326.name: Vincent Meis
326.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
326.ability:
Zeal.
Order (Melee): Set the power of a non-boosted enemy to 1.
326.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order (Melee): Set the power of a non-boosted enemy to 1.
326.flavor: By day, Captain of the Vizima City Guard. By night, merciless avenger and defender of the downtrodden.

327.name: Hym
327.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
327.ability: Deploy: Swap this unit's power with a damaged unit's power.
327.abilityHTML: Deploy: Swap this unit's power with a damaged unit's power.
327.flavor: The gods' speak to me… I hear them whisper from the shadows…

328.name: Olaf
328.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
328.ability: Order: Boost Olaf by twice the amount he is damaged.
328.abilityHTML: Order: Boost Olaf by twice the amount he is damaged.
328.flavor: 10-time winner of the venerable title of Champion of the An Skellig Arena.

329.name: Ulfhedinn
329.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
329.ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by half its current power.
329.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by half its current power.
329.flavor: Werewolf? Oh, no, no… this is something far, far worse.

330.name: Dimun Warship
330.keywordsHTML: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
330.ability:
Whenever you play a Pirate, damage self and a random enemy unit by 1.
Deathwish: Summon a random bronze Pirate from your Graveyard to this row.
330.abilityHTML: Whenever you play a Pirate, damage self and a random enemy unit by 1. Deathwish: Summon a random bronze Pirate from your Graveyard to this row.
330.flavor: Clan Dimun warships are light and fast, perfect for racing down slow merchant frigates.

331.name: Siren
331.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
331.ability: Deploy: Boost an ally by 1. If it's a Beast, boost it by 3 instead.
331.abilityHTML: Deploy: Boost an ally by 1. If it's a Beast, boost it by 3 instead.
331.flavor: Legends claim they lure sailors to their doom with their entrancing songs… though more likely, the sailors were more entranced by their other ample charms.

332.name: Alpha Werewolf
332.keywordsHTML: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
332.flavor: Some say lycanthropy's contagious - get bit by a werewolf, you turn into one yourself. Witchers know that's nonsense, of course - only a powerful curse can bring on this condition.

333.name: Assassination
333.ability: Damage a unit by 6. Decrease the damage by 1 for each unit adjacent to it.
333.abilityHTML: Damage a unit by 6. Decrease the damage by 1 for each unit adjacent to it.
333.flavor: Assassin — one of the most popular professions at the imperial court, just after scribe and courtesan.

334.name: Infiltrator
334.keywordsHTML: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
334.ability: Melee: On round end, shuffle this unit into your opponent's deck.
334.abilityHTML: Melee: On round end, shuffle this unit into your opponent's deck.
334.flavor: You can run, but you'll never hide.

335.name: Kingslayer
335.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
335.ability: Deploy: Reveal the top card from your opponent's deck and Banish it.
335.abilityHTML: Deploy: Reveal the top card from your opponent's deck and Banish it.
335.flavor: The School of the Viper shall be reborn… Letho saw to that.

336.name: Pyrotechnician
336.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
336.ability: Order: Damage a random enemy unit and self by 4.
336.abilityHTML: Order: Damage a random enemy unit and self by 4.
336.flavor: An extraordinarily risky, and thus much revered, Mahakam trade. Its best-known practitioner was a dwarf by the name of Mikkel Bay.

337.name: Farseer
337.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
337.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random card from your deck. If it's a special card, boost self by 3.
337.abilityHTML: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random card from your deck. If it's a special card, boost self by 3.
337.flavor: Her words might seem unintelligible at times, but they always contain hidden meanings and tremendous wisdom.

338.name: Elven Scribe
338.ability:
Remove a Counter whenever you play a Special card.
Counter: 3.
When Counter reaches 0, boost self by 6.
338.abilityHTML:
Remove a Counter whenever you play a Special card.
Counter: 3.
When Counter reaches 0, boost self by 6.
338.flavor: Knowledge, my dear, is a privilege, and privileges are only shared among equals.

339.name: Panther
339.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
339.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 4 turns.
339.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 4 turns.
339.flavor: An Oxenfurt scholar once examined a panther and declared it was nothing more than a leopard of a different color. The panther seemed indifferent to this pronouncement and gobbled him up before he could complete his research.

340.name: Tuirseach Bearmaster
340.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
340.ability:
Deploy: Give an allied Beast Vitality for 3 turns.
Bonded: Boost an allied Beast by 3 instead.
340.abilityHTML: Deploy: Give an allied Beast Vitality for 3 turns. Bonded: Boost an allied Beast by 3 instead.
340.flavor: Don't touch him. Don't look him in the eyes. In fact… don't go anywhere near him.

341.name: Dimun Corsair
341.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
341.ability:
Zeal. Order (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 2 turns. Cooldown: 2.
Whenever you play a Ship, decrease Cooldown by 1.
341.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 2 turns. Cooldown: 2. Whenever you play a Ship, decrease Cooldown by 1.
341.flavor: The sea's ours, along with everythin' that floats, swims or sails in it!

342.name: Dimun Smuggler
342.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
342.ability:
Deploy: If played next to a Ship, Spawn a base copy of self on this row.
Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 1.
342.abilityHTML: Deploy: If played next to a Ship, Spawn a base copy of self on this row. Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 1.
342.flavor: Spikeroog's a barren backwater, but that don't bother us - everythin' we need, we take from you.

343.name: Heymaey Flaminica
343.keywordsHTML: Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
343.ability: At the end of your turn, Heal all other units on this row by 1.
343.abilityHTML: At the end of your turn, Heal all other units on this row by 1.
343.flavor: A flaminica, the highest position among the druidesses, commands a great deal of respect and wields a great deal of power.

344.name: Heymaey Protector
344.ability: Whenever an adjacent unit takes damage, boost self by 1.
344.abilityHTML: Whenever an adjacent unit takes damage, boost self by 1.
344.flavor: He fears nothing save Freya's wrath... and his wife's.

345.name: Royal Decree
345.ability: Play a unit from your deck.
345.abilityHTML: Play a unit from your deck.
345.flavor: We, Foltest, by divine right King of Temeria, Prince of Sodden, Senior Protector of Brugge, etcetera, etcetera, do hereby decree the following…

346.name: Battle Trance
346.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
346.ability:
Order: Spawn and play Mardroeme.
Whenever you play an Alchemy card, Heal a random allied unit by 1.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
346.abilityHTML: Order: Spawn and play Mardroeme. Whenever you play an Alchemy card, Heal a random allied unit by 1. This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
346.flavor: No one can replace Bran. Though they're sure to try.

347.name: Onslaught
347.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
347.ability:
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Cooldown: 2

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
347.abilityHTML: Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Cooldown: 2 This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
347.flavor: Nilfgaardians call 'im Tirth ys Muire, the Wild Boar o' the Sea. Use 'im to scare their kiddies!

348.name: Reckless Flurry
348.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
348.ability:
Order: Split 3 damage randomly between all enemy units, ignoring their Armor.
Charges: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
348.abilityHTML: Order: Split 3 damage randomly between all enemy units, ignoring their Armor. Charges: 3 This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
348.flavor: No one knows how he got his nickname – no one's dared to ask.

349.name: Imprisonment
349.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
349.ability:
Order: Lock an enemy unit and damage it by 3. Charge: 2.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
349.abilityHTML: Order: Lock an enemy unit and damage it by 3. Charge: 2. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
349.flavor: They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the Headless.

350.name: Imperial Formation
350.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
350.ability:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 2. Charge: 3.
Once all Charges are used up, move a unit from your deck to the top.
Whenever you play a Soldier, give it 1 Armor for each adjacent Soldier.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
350.abilityHTML: Order: Boost an allied unit by 2. Charge: 3. Once all Charges are used up, move a unit from your deck to the top. Whenever you play a Soldier, give it 1 Armor for each adjacent Soldier. This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
350.flavor: The summer sun reflected in the quiet waters of the Alba – that's Nilfgaard to me.

351.name: Tactical Decision
351.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
351.ability:
Order: Spawn and play Morvran Voorhis.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
351.abilityHTML: Order: Spawn and play Morvran Voorhis. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
