1094.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. If moved to the top of your deck during your turn, Summon self to a random allied row and damage a random enemy unit by 2.
1094.flavor: Somewhere deep within Nilfgaard’s imperial archives is a manuscript titled “Forty-Seven Ways to Kill a Man”. It’s a surprisingly jovial read.

1095.name: Fulmar
1095.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
1095.ability:
Deploy: Spawn and play Tears of Siren.
Order: Replace Rain on an enemy row with Storm of the same duration.
1095.abilityHTML: Deploy: Spawn and play Tears of Siren. Order: Replace Rain on an enemy row with Storm of the same duration.
1095.flavor: “Praise the Goddess for all the paths that she opens before you, and turn your greedy gaze away from those She closes in her wisdom” - Fulmar

1096.name: Bride of the Sea
1096.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
1096.ability: Deploy: Play an Alchemy from your graveyard with provision cost 4 or less. Increase the cost by the total duration of Rain and Storm on your opponent's side.
1096.abilityHTML: Deploy: Play an Alchemy from your graveyard with provision cost 4 or less. Increase the cost by the total duration of Rain and Storm on your opponent's side.
1096.flavor: Chosen from among the descendants of Rioghan the Undying. A man whose deeds have cast a dark shadow over his kin for decades.

1097.name: Melusine Cultist
1097.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
1097.ability:
Order: Spawn Rain for 2 turns on an enemy row.
At the end of your turn, if there is Rain on the opposite row, boost the unit to the right by 1. If there is Storm on the opposite row, boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
1097.abilityHTML: Order: Spawn Rain for 2 turns on an enemy row. At the end of your turn, if there is Rain on the opposite row, boost the unit to the right by 1. If there is Storm on the opposite row, boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
1097.flavor: But we can still eat fish, can't we?

1098.name: Tears of Siren
1098.keywordsHTML: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
1098.ability: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns, then Spawn a Deafening Siren on the opposite row.
1098.abilityHTML: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns, then Spawn a Deafening Siren on the opposite row.
1098.flavor: It is said they only cry for love lost. A pity they only love once in a lifetime…

1099.name: Francesca Findabair
1099.keywordsHTML: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
1099.ability:
Veil.
Whenever you play a Special card, remove one Counter.
Counter: 3.
When Counter reaches 0, Spawn and play a copy of the last Special card you played. If it is Neutral, give it Doomed.
1099.abilityHTML: Veil. Whenever you play a Special card, remove one Counter. Counter: 3. When Counter reaches 0, Spawn and play a copy of the last Special card you played. If it is Neutral, give it Doomed.
1099.flavor: Francesca Findabair's blue elven eyes were as impenetrable and hard as glass. When he was introduced to her, the Daisy of the Valleys smiled. The smile, though incredibly beautiful, filled the witcher with terror.

1100.name: Vanadáin
1100.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1100.ability:
Deploy: Move up to 2 cards from your hand to the bottom of your deck. Add Waylay to your hand for each card moved that way.
Whenever you play Waylay, Spawn an Elven Deadeye on this row.
1100.abilityHTML: Deploy: Move up to 2 cards from your hand to the bottom of your deck. Add Waylay to your hand for each card moved that way. Whenever you play Waylay, Spawn an Elven Deadeye on this row.
1100.flavor: It’s better to first gag humans, then listen to what they have to say.

1101.name: Sorceress of Dol Blathanna
1101.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
1101.ability: Order: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to or lower than this card's power.
1101.abilityHTML: Order: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to or lower than this card's power.
1101.flavor: Whilst you are mesmerized by the fishes, a different elf moves to cut your throat.

1102.name: Whisperer of Dol Blathanna
1102.keywordsHTML: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1102.ability:
Veil.
When you play a special card, Spawn a base copy of self on this row and remove a Counter.
Counter: 1.
1102.abilityHTML: Veil. When you play a special card, Spawn a base copy of self on this row and remove a Counter. Counter: 1.
1102.flavor: You won't find more fertile land than in the Valley of Flowers, and with a little magic you can count on a ripe harvest up to three times a year.

1103.name: Gerhart of Aelle
1103.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
1103.ability:
Zeal. Patience.
Order: Create and play a [4] provision Spell.
1103.abilityHTML: Zeal. Patience. Order: Create and play a [4] provision Spell.
1103.flavor: Gerhart of Aelle, otherwise known as Hen Gedymdeith, was the oldest living sorcerer. That is, until his death on Thanedd Island during the coup, where his heart, feeble from inconceivable age, simply gave out among the ruckus.

1104.name: Istredd
1104.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1104.ability:
Zeal. Patience.
Order: Draw up to [1] card(s), then shuffle the same number of cards back to your deck.
Whenever you draw a unit card, boost it by 1, if it's not a unit, boost self by 1 instead.
1104.abilityHTML: Zeal. Patience. Order: Draw up to [1] card(s), then shuffle the same number of cards back to your deck. Whenever you draw a unit card, boost it by 1, if it's not a unit, boost self by 1 instead.
1104.flavor: Love can make one do crazy things. The loss of love, even more so.

1105.name: Casting Contest
1105.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
1105.ability: Boost an allied unit by 5. If it's bronze, reset its Order ability and give it Zeal.
1105.abilityHTML: Boost an allied unit by 5. If it's bronze, reset its Order ability and give it Zeal.
1105.flavor: Tales of Yennefer of Vengerberg have spurred many an inebriated attempt to replicate her fabled foot-casting. It never ends well.

1106.name: Ban Ard Student
1106.keywordsHTML: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
1106.ability:
Patience.
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by [0].
1106.abilityHTML: Patience. Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by [0].
1106.flavor: Kaedweni Intelligence considers Ban Ard a hot spot for recruitment, and expelled students⁠—of which there are many⁠—often find themselves swiftly enlisted within the secret service.

1107.name: She Who Knows
1107.keywordsHTML: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
1107.ability: Sabbath: At the end of round, give Resilience to the highest base power unit on your side of the battlefield.
1107.abilityHTML: Sabbath: At the end of round, give Resilience to the highest base power unit on your side of the battlefield.
1107.flavor: She knows well what kind of clay her daughters are made of. After all, she kneaded it herself.

1108.name: Rat Catcheress
1108.keywordsHTML: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
1108.ability:
Whenever this unit is damaged, reduce its base power by 1.
Sabbath: Cancel the ability above.
Whenever you play a Relict, increase this unit's base power by 1.
1108.abilityHTML: Whenever this unit is damaged, reduce its base power by 1. Sabbath: Cancel the ability above. Whenever you play a Relict, increase this unit's base power by 1.
1108.flavor: The witch grabbed the bells and started to play a lively melody that attracted small rodents and children alike.

1109.name: Gan Ceann
1109.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1109.ability: Deploy: Increase this unit's base power by 2 for each adjacent Relict.
1109.abilityHTML: Deploy: Increase this unit's base power by 2 for each adjacent Relict.
1109.flavor: A head in the hands is worth two on the neck.

1110.name: Witch Apprentice
1110.keywordsHTML: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
1110.ability: Sabbath: At the end of your turn, boost self by 2.
1110.abilityHTML: Sabbath: At the end of your turn, boost self by 2.
1110.flavor: Mistress said I would have to toss it on the spit after I finish my studies, but she was just kidding. Right...?

1111.name: The Witchfinder
1111.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
1111.ability:
Deploy: Spawn 3 Syndicate Crowns.
At the end of your turn, if no enemy unit has a Bounty, place a Bounty on the highest-power enemy unit.
1111.abilityHTML: Deploy: Spawn 3 Syndicate Crowns. At the end of your turn, if no enemy unit has a Bounty, place a Bounty on the highest-power enemy unit.
1111.flavor: Woe to all those who find themselves on the wrong side of Octavia Hale, the self-proclaimed world-renowned finder⁠—and punisher⁠—of witches, warlocks, and were-things.

1112.name: Syndicate Crown
1112.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
1112.ability:
Doomed. Zeal.
Order: Gain 1 Coin and Banish self.
1112.abilityHTML: Doomed. Zeal. Order: Gain 1 Coin and Banish self.

1113.name: Fabian Hale
1113.keywordsHTML: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1113.ability:
Intimidate.
Deploy: Place a Bounty on an enemy unit. If there already was an enemy unit with a Bounty, gain Coins equal to its base power.
1113.abilityHTML: Intimidate. Deploy: Place a Bounty on an enemy unit. If there already was an enemy unit with a Bounty, gain Coins equal to its base power.
1113.flavor: Fabian takes great pride in his work, with each “victory” etched upon his skin as a permanent reminder of memories most pleasant.

1114.name: Hysteria
1114.keywordsHTML: Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
1114.ability: Place a Bounty on an enemy unit and damage it by 3. If it already has a Bounty, double the damage.
1114.abilityHTML: Place a Bounty on an enemy unit and damage it by 3. If it already has a Bounty, double the damage.
1114.flavor: Somebody’s poisoned the waterhole! With innards!

1115.name: Vigilantes
1115.keywordsHTML: Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
1115.ability: Whenever a Bounty is placed on an enemy unit, damage it by 2.
1115.abilityHTML: Whenever a Bounty is placed on an enemy unit, damage it by 2.
1115.flavor: The alderman’s wife worked all night on these here costumes⁠—you should be damned grateful, you swines!

1116.name: Teleportation
1116.ability: Reset an allied unit's power. If it's a bronze unit, replay it instead.
1116.abilityHTML: Reset an allied unit's power. If it's a bronze unit, replay it instead.
1116.flavor: There was a flash and he stopped seeing, hearing or feeling anything⁠—apart from cold. Cold was the only thing felt inside the black nothingness, amid silence, amorphousness and timelessness, because the teleport dulled and extinguished all other senses.

1117.name: Megascope
1117.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1117.ability: Deploy: Pick a bronze allied unit. After 2 turns, Spawn its base copy on the right of Megascope.
1117.abilityHTML: Deploy: Pick a bronze allied unit. After 2 turns, Spawn its base copy on the right of Megascope.
1117.flavor: In order to communicate at a distance, one must construct a magical artefact⁠—a megascope⁠—using magic.

1118.name: Left Fucking Flank
1118.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
1118.flavor: I's a war veteran! Spare me a crown?

1119.name: Right Fucking Flank
1119.keywordsHTML: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
1119.flavor: I's a war veteran! Spare me a crown?

1120.name: Artaud Terranova
1120.keywordsHTML: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
1120.ability:
Assimilate.
Deploy: Spawn and play a base copy of any non-Disloyal unit you gave Spying to during this game, excluding self.
1120.abilityHTML: Assimilate. Deploy: Spawn and play a base copy of any non-Disloyal unit you gave Spying to during this game, excluding self.

1121.name: Sunset Wanderers
1121.keywordsHTML: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
1121.ability:
This card starts in the leftmost position of your hand.
At the beginning of your turn, while in hand, move self one position to the right then boost self by 1.
At the end of your turn, if you haven't passed and there are no cards to the right of this card, Summon self from your hand to a random allied row, then draw a card.
1121.abilityHTML: This card starts in the leftmost position of your hand. At the beginning of your turn, while in hand, move self one position to the right then boost self by 1. At the end of your turn, if you haven't passed and there are no cards to the right of this card, Summon self from your hand to a random allied row, then draw a card.
1121.flavor: It seemed like Dandelion meant to journey with the witcher, even to the edge of the world.

1122.name: Fercart
1122.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
1122.ability:
Deploy: Play a special card from your hand, then draw a card.
Whenever you play a special card, give Spying to a random non-Spying enemy unit.
1122.abilityHTML: Deploy: Play a special card from your hand, then draw a card. Whenever you play a special card, give Spying to a random non-Spying enemy unit.
1122.flavor: Pawns will never know of the unseen hands, maneuvering them toward certain doom.

1123.name: Master of Puppets
1123.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1123.ability:
Order: Seize a bronze enemy unit, then move self to the opposite row.
Cooldown: 2
1123.abilityHTML: Order: Seize a bronze enemy unit, then move self to the opposite row. Cooldown: 2

1124.name: Thanedd Turncoat
1124.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Conspiracy: Trigger this ability if target unit has Spying status. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1124.ability:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Spying.
Order, Conspiracy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Whenever an enemy unit gains Spying, reduce this unit's Cooldown by 1.
Cooldown: 2
1124.abilityHTML: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Spying. Order, Conspiracy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Whenever an enemy unit gains Spying, reduce this unit's Cooldown by 1. Cooldown: 2
1124.flavor: Hell hath no fury like a sorceress scorned.

1125.name: Melusine
1125.keywordsHTML: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
1125.ability:
Veil.
Order: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns then damage self by 2.
At the end of your turn damage adjacent units by 1, then gain 1 base power for every unit damaged. If any unit damaged was a Cultist, refresh Melusine's Order.
1125.abilityHTML: Veil. Order: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns then damage self by 2. At the end of your turn damage adjacent units by 1, then gain 1 base power for every unit damaged. If any unit damaged was a Cultist, refresh Melusine's Order.
1125.flavor: The Lady sits on her throne, devouring our offerings and demanding more. Yet, She does not try to rule over us in any particular way, so She is actually better than any jarl.

1126.name: Offering to the Sea
1126.keywordsHTML: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1126.ability: Damage all units on the battlefield by 1, then Spawn a Deafening Siren on a random allied row and boost it by the number of allied targets.
1126.abilityHTML: Damage all units on the battlefield by 1, then Spawn a Deafening Siren on a random allied row and boost it by the number of allied targets.
1126.flavor: Cultists proclaim that the maidens are offered to the sea, not eaten by its monsters. Yet, for the latter, the semantics makes no difference.

1127.name: Havfrue Singer
1127.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1127.ability:
Deploy: Heal an allied unit by 2.
The first time you Heal an allied unit during your turn, Spawn a Deafening Siren on this row.
1127.abilityHTML: Deploy: Heal an allied unit by 2. The first time you Heal an allied unit during your turn, Spawn a Deafening Siren on this row.
1127.flavor: No human can match sirens in singing. Some, however, are talented enough to compel sirens to listen.

1128.name: Hermit
1128.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
1128.ability:
Deploy: Damage self by 4.
Berserk 6: At the end of your turn, damage the unit to the right by 1 then Heal self by 2.
1128.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage self by 4. Berserk 6: At the end of your turn, damage the unit to the right by 1 then Heal self by 2.
1128.flavor: Oh, good Lady, bless your faithful servant with a fat flounder.

1129.name: Simlas Finn aep Dabairr
1129.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1129.ability: Deploy: Play all copies of a bronze special card from your deck.
1129.abilityHTML: Deploy: Play all copies of a bronze special card from your deck.
1129.flavor: I am a Sage. Naturally I know more than you do.

1130.name: Saov Ainmhi'dh
1130.ability: Boost an allied unit by 5. At the end of your turn, if this card is in your graveyard, transform self into Saov Ainmhi'dh: Unity.
1130.abilityHTML: Boost an allied unit by 5. At the end of your turn, if this card is in your graveyard, transform self into Saov Ainmhi'dh: Unity.
1130.flavor: Expecto pa⁠— No, wait. That’s not right.

1131.name: Orb of Insight
1131.keywordsHTML: Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
1131.ability:
Boost an allied unit by 2 and give it Vitality (2).
While in your graveyard, remove the Counter by 1 whenever you play a special card. When the Counter reaches 0, play this card and give it Doomed.
Counter: 3
1131.abilityHTML: Boost an allied unit by 2 and give it Vitality (2). While in your graveyard, remove the Counter by 1 whenever you play a special card. When the Counter reaches 0, play this card and give it Doomed. Counter: 3
1131.flavor: It shows only one of many possible futures.

1132.name: Elven Seer
1132.keywordsHTML: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1132.ability:
When you target this unit with a bronze special card, Spawn and play a copy of that special card.
Counter: 1.
1132.abilityHTML: When you target this unit with a bronze special card, Spawn and play a copy of that special card. Counter: 1.
1132.flavor: I predict a bad future for your race, dh’oine.

1133.name: Tissaia de Vries
1133.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1133.ability: Deploy: At the end of this turn, reset the Order of all allied Mages that used their Order during this turn.
1133.abilityHTML: Deploy: At the end of this turn, reset the Order of all allied Mages that used their Order during this turn.
1133.flavor: “They will not enter here. No one invited those royalist lackeys, who carry out the orders of their short-sighted kings!” - Tissaia de Vries

1134.name: Leticia Charbonneau
1134.keywordsHTML: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1134.ability:
Patience.
Order (Ranged): At the end of this turn, Patience value of your units is increased by [1] instead.
1134.abilityHTML: Patience. Order (Ranged): At the end of this turn, Patience value of your units is increased by [1] instead.
1134.flavor: “You cannot control what the world throws at you, but you can decide on how to react.” - Leticia Charbonneau

1135.name: Practice Makes Perfect
1135.keywordsHTML: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
1135.ability:
Shuffle an allied bronze mage to your deck, then play a random bronze mage from your deck. Boost the unit you played by 0.
Increase the boost by 1 for each unit with Patience you played this game.
1135.abilityHTML: Shuffle an allied bronze mage to your deck, then play a random bronze mage from your deck. Boost the unit you played by 0. Increase the boost by 1 for each unit with Patience you played this game.
1135.flavor: A lesson a day keeps mediocrity away.

1136.name: Aretuza Student
1136.keywordsHTML: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1136.ability:
Patience.
Order (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by [0].
1136.abilityHTML: Patience. Order (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by [0].
1136.flavor: Knowledge beyond measure is a sorceress’s greatest treasure.

1137.name: Bloody Mistress
1137.keywordsHTML: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1137.ability: Sabbath: At the end of your turn, Spawn Gernichora's Fruit on both sides of this unit and transform self into Gernichora without changing power.
1137.abilityHTML: Sabbath: At the end of your turn, Spawn Gernichora's Fruit on both sides of this unit and transform self into Gernichora without changing power.
1137.flavor: Once the effigy is on a tree, even the most virtuous of souls will find themselves inexplicably drawn toward her domain.

1138.name: Gernichora
1138.keywordsHTML: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
1138.ability:
At the end of your turn, transform self into Bloody Mistress without changing power.
Sabbath: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 for each allied Gernichora's Fruit instead.
1138.abilityHTML: At the end of your turn, transform self into Bloody Mistress without changing power. Sabbath: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 for each allied Gernichora's Fruit instead.
1138.flavor: Once the effigy is on a tree, even the most virtuous of souls will find themselves inexplicably drawn toward her domain.

1139.name: Mammuna
1139.keywordsHTML: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
1139.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Banish a bronze unit from your graveyard and boost self by its power, then Summon a copy of it from your deck to this row.
Sabbath: Play the copy instead.
1139.abilityHTML: Zeal. Order: Banish a bronze unit from your graveyard and boost self by its power, then Summon a copy of it from your deck to this row. Sabbath: Play the copy instead.

1140.name: Selfeater
1140.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1140.ability:
Order: Halve this unit's base power, then Spawn a copy with the same base power on this row.
Whenever you play a Relict, increase this unit's base power by 1.
1140.abilityHTML: Order: Halve this unit's base power, then Spawn a copy with the same base power on this row. Whenever you play a Relict, increase this unit's base power by 1.

1141.name: Bleeding Effigy
1141.keywordsHTML: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
1141.ability:
Banish a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard, then boost an allied unit by its power.
If you control Bloody Mistress or Gernichora, you may target gold units.
1141.abilityHTML: Banish a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard, then boost an allied unit by its power. If you control Bloody Mistress or Gernichora, you may target gold units.
1141.flavor: A drop of blood, a hair from the head, a fragment of a nail…

1142.name: The Scoundrel
1142.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time. Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
1142.ability:
Deploy: Summon the top bronze unit from your opponent's deck to the opposite row, then place a Bounty on it.
Tribute 2: Choose a bronze unit to Summon instead, then place a Bounty on it.
Fee 1: Damage the enemy unit with Bounty by 1.
1142.abilityHTML: Deploy: Summon the top bronze unit from your opponent's deck to the opposite row, then place a Bounty on it. Tribute 2: Choose a bronze unit to Summon instead, then place a Bounty on it. Fee 1: Damage the enemy unit with Bounty by 1.
1142.flavor: There have been sightings of a slender, sinister-looking man slipping in and out of shadow⁠. The Hales must be in town.

1143.name: Ignatius Hale
1143.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
1143.ability:
Deploy: Damage this unit by its Tribute cost.
Tribute 9: Cancel the Deploy ability.
Whenever you place a Bounty on an enemy unit, reduce this unit's Tribute cost by 1.
1143.abilityHTML: Deploy: Damage this unit by its Tribute cost. Tribute 9: Cancel the Deploy ability. Whenever you place a Bounty on an enemy unit, reduce this unit's Tribute cost by 1.

1144.name: Confession Extractor
1144.keywordsHTML: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
1144.ability:
Profit 5.
While in your graveyard, damage an enemy unit by 1 whenever you place a Bounty on it.
Counter: 3
1144.abilityHTML: Profit 5. While in your graveyard, damage an enemy unit by 1 whenever you place a Bounty on it. Counter: 3
1144.flavor: Whether they spit lies or cry truths, it matters not⁠—the Extractor always gets its confession.

1145.name: Scapegoat
1145.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
1145.ability:
Deploy: If there is no Bounty on the battlefield, damage self by 3.
Whenever an enemy unit with Bounty is damaged, Heal self by 1.
1145.abilityHTML: Deploy: If there is no Bounty on the battlefield, damage self by 3. Whenever an enemy unit with Bounty is damaged, Heal self by 1.
1145.flavor: Fact often gives way to fiction.

1146.name: Bearification
1146.ability: Transform an artifact into an Elder Bear. If it's on your side of the battlefield, boost it by 4.
1146.abilityHTML: Transform an artifact into an Elder Bear. If it's on your side of the battlefield, boost it by 4.

1147.name: Dwimveandra
1147.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1147.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Set an allied Scenario to the final chapter.
Deploy (Ranged): Refresh the Order of an allied Location.
1147.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Set an allied Scenario to the final chapter. Deploy (Ranged): Refresh the Order of an allied Location.
1147.flavor: There are those who stay at home and those who leave.

1148.name: Saov Ainmhi'dh: Unity
1148.keywordsHTML: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1148.ability:
While in your graveyard, remove a Counter whenever you play a special card. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon self from your graveyard to your Ranged row.
Counter: 3
1148.abilityHTML: While in your graveyard, remove a Counter whenever you play a special card. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon self from your graveyard to your Ranged row. Counter: 3
1148.flavor: Expecto pa⁠— No, wait. That’s not right.

1149.name: Vilgefortz: Renegade
1149.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1149.ability: Deploy: Swap a card from your opponent's graveyard with a card in your hand.
1149.abilityHTML: Deploy: Swap a card from your opponent's graveyard with a card in your hand.
1149.flavor: Four times, Geralt struck. To the temple, to the neck, under the arm, to the thigh. Each blow should have been fatal. Yet each was parried by the mage.

1150.name: Lydia van Bredevoort
1150.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1150.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Create and play a bronze special card from your opponent's faction.
Deploy (Ranged): Play a bronze special card from your opponent's graveyard.
1150.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Create and play a bronze special card from your opponent's faction. Deploy (Ranged): Play a bronze special card from your opponent's graveyard.
1150.flavor: Whether by brush or by sorcery, there was no event, emotion, or scene beyond Lydia's power to depict. Apart from joy.

1151.name: Imperial Practitioner
1151.keywordsHTML: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1151.ability:
Assimilate.
Order: Spawn a base copy of the last card that went to your opponent's graveyard on top of your deck.
1151.abilityHTML: Assimilate. Order: Spawn a base copy of the last card that went to your opponent's graveyard on top of your deck.
1151.flavor: The body is a slab of wet clay. One need only use the correct tools to shape it into something... more.

1152.name: Illusionist
1152.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
1152.ability:
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard on the right of this card and set its power to 1.
Bonded: Don't set its power to 1.
1152.abilityHTML: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard on the right of this card and set its power to 1. Bonded: Don't set its power to 1.
1152.flavor: “When you are few, make them believe you are many. If they still attack, well... you were fucked either way.” ⁠- Unnamed Nilfgaardian strategist

1153.name: Fucusya
1153.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
1153.ability: Deploy: Play a Skellige unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 10 or less and give it Doomed, then Spawn Rain on the opposite row with a duration equal to unused provisions.
1153.abilityHTML: Deploy: Play a Skellige unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 10 or less and give it Doomed, then Spawn Rain on the opposite row with a duration equal to unused provisions.
1153.flavor: Like mermaids, the sea witches can experience true love only once in a lifetime. And Fucusya wasted her only time on a human.

1154.name: Rioghan the Undying
1154.keywordsHTML: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
1154.ability:
This card starts in your graveyard. 
When played or Summoned from the graveyard, trigger all remaining Rain and Storm on the opponent's side of the battlefield.
1154.abilityHTML: This card starts in your graveyard. When played or Summoned from the graveyard, trigger all remaining Rain and Storm on the opponent's side of the battlefield.
1154.flavor: “Your life will burn as bright as the love between us.” - Fucusya

1155.name: Messenger of the Sea
1155.keywordsHTML: Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
1155.ability: Whenever Rain or Storm damages enemy units, boost self by the damage dealt.
1155.abilityHTML: Whenever Rain or Storm damages enemy units, boost self by the damage dealt.

1156.name: Little Havfrue
1156.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
1156.ability:
Deploy (Bonded): Increase this card's base power by 2.
Order: Damage self by 4 and Spawn Rain for 2 turns on an enemy row.
1156.abilityHTML: Deploy (Bonded): Increase this card's base power by 2. Order: Damage self by 4 and Spawn Rain for 2 turns on an enemy row.
1156.flavor: They will not hesitate to shower you with gifts and affection. They will proudly profess their unwavering adoration and unyielding devotion. Yet, I ask you, when has a man ever given up his legs for love? Hmm?

1157.name: Filavandrel aén Fidháil
1157.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1157.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Create and play a Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to this unit's power.
Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to or lower than this unit's power.
1157.abilityHTML: Deploy (Melee): Create and play a Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to this unit's power. Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to or lower than this unit's power.
1157.flavor: He has pride⁠—the pride of someone who has never had to bow.

1158.name: Torque
1158.keywordsHTML: Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
1158.ability:
Whenever this card is boosted in your hand, boost a random different unit in your hand by the same amount.
Devotion: This card always starts in your hand.
1158.abilityHTML: Whenever this card is boosted in your hand, boost a random different unit in your hand by the same amount. Devotion: This card always starts in your hand.
1158.flavor: Where an elf cannot go himself, he sends a devil.

1159.name: Bountiful Harvest
1159.keywordsHTML: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
1159.ability: Create and play a bronze Dol Blathanna Elf, then, depending on the position of chosen unit, boost the left-most, random, or the right-most unit in your hand by 2.
1159.abilityHTML: Create and play a bronze Dol Blathanna Elf, then, depending on the position of chosen unit, boost the left-most, random, or the right-most unit in your hand by 2.
1159.flavor: Never have we tilled nor torn up the land, unlike you dh'oine with your hoes and ploughs. You wrest bloody tributes from the Queen of the Fields, while we celebrate her every gift.

1160.name: Watcher of the Valley
1160.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
1160.ability:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding equal to the amount of boost on this card.
Bonded: Damage it instead.
1160.abilityHTML: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding equal to the amount of boost on this card. Bonded: Damage it instead.
1160.flavor: He notched his staff for every interloper who thought to try their luck. Soon, the notches, much like the intruders, could no longer be distinguished.

1161.name: Chapter of Wizards
1161.keywordsHTML: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1161.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play Runeword.
Order: Spawn a base copy of the last played allied bronze Mage on this row.
1161.abilityHTML: Resilience. Deploy: Spawn and play Runeword. Order: Spawn a base copy of the last played allied bronze Mage on this row.
1161.flavor: In the wake of the Novigradian Union, the Chapter of the Gift and the Art sought to ensure all magic was adequately regulated. Yet, some mages refused to be restrained by the fetters of absolute authority, choosing instead to practice their craft away from prying eyes. Deemed 'enemies of the institution', these renegades were promptly hunted down and punished.

1162.name: Raffard’s Vengeance
1162.keywordsHTML: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
1162.ability:
Order: Play a bronze unit from your hand, then draw a card.
Cooldown: 5
Crew: Whenever you play a unit next to this card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
Mages contribute to this card's Crew ability.
1162.abilityHTML: Order: Play a bronze unit from your hand, then draw a card. Cooldown: 5 Crew: Whenever you play a unit next to this card, damage a random enemy unit by 2. Mages contribute to this card's Crew ability.
1162.flavor: Step 1. Lock the long arm lever to the hook trigger, and place the load into the sling harness.\nStep 2. Set the counterweight to no less than eighty times the load, and line the glide track with pyrite.\nStep 3. Conjure and align the portal to target location, and unleash hell.

1163.name: Alumni
1163.keyword: deploy, zeal, order, melee, ranged, patience
1163.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
1163.ability:
Deploy: If both values are equal to or higher than 4, gain Zeal.
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 0.
Order (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 0.
Values correspond to the highest Patience achieved by your Ban Ard Student or Aretuza Student cards.
1163.abilityHTML: Deploy: If both values are equal to or higher than 4, gain Zeal. Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 0. Order (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 0. Values correspond to the highest Patience achieved by your Ban Ard Student or Aretuza Student cards.
1163.flavor: Deep down, they had both been waiting for this moment for a long time. Live targets had been a bit of a taboo in academia.

1164.name: Meditating Mage
1164.keywordsHTML: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
1164.ability:
Patience.
Order: Gain Vitality for [0] turns.
Bonded: Also gain Resilience.
1164.abilityHTML: Patience. Order: Gain Vitality for [0] turns. Bonded: Also gain Resilience.
1164.flavor: To become one with air, think away the ground.

1165.name: Yaga
1165.keyword: deploy, sabbath, zeal, order, consume, cooldown
1165.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1165.ability:
Deploy (Sabbath): Gain Zeal.
Order: Consume a 4 provision unit, then increase the provision value by 1.
Cooldown: 2
1165.abilityHTML: Deploy (Sabbath): Gain Zeal. Order: Consume a 4 provision unit, then increase the provision value by 1. Cooldown: 2
1165.flavor: The Witch Queen sat upon her throne of bones, gorging herself on all and sucking the life out of everything that came her way. For centuries, she feasted, until one day, she could no longer stand at all. And so, she ate some more.

1166.name: Witches' Sabbath
1166.keywordsHTML: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
1166.ability: Summon up to 3 highest-power units from your opponent's graveyard to an enemy row, then Summon as many highest-power Monster units from your graveyard to the opposite row and give them Doomed.
1166.abilityHTML: Summon up to 3 highest-power units from your opponent's graveyard to an enemy row, then Summon as many highest-power Monster units from your graveyard to the opposite row and give them Doomed.
1166.flavor: For the sabbath, at least three witches are required. With two, it’s only a quarrel.

1167.name: Incubus
1167.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
1167.ability: Deploy: Summon a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard to the opposite row, then Summon a bronze unit of equal or less provisions from your graveyard to this row.
1167.abilityHTML: Deploy: Summon a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard to the opposite row, then Summon a bronze unit of equal or less provisions from your graveyard to this row.

1168.name: Lesser Witch
1168.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
1168.ability:
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of self in your graveyard.
Bonded: Spawn a base copy of self on this row instead.
1168.abilityHTML: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of self in your graveyard. Bonded: Spawn a base copy of self on this row instead.
1168.flavor: Less powerful, but no less terrible.

1169.name: The Brute
1169.keywordsHTML: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
1169.ability:
Profit 0.
Deploy: Boost self by 0.
Boost is equal to the base power of the last destroyed enemy unit with a Bounty.
Whenever you place a Bounty on an enemy unit, increase this unit's Profit by 1.
1169.abilityHTML: Profit 0. Deploy: Boost self by 0. Boost is equal to the base power of the last destroyed enemy unit with a Bounty. Whenever you place a Bounty on an enemy unit, increase this unit's Profit by 1.
1169.flavor: He’s a slayer of all things wicked, a saviour of the common folk, and a very good boy. At least, that’s what his mum tells him.

1170.name: Octavia Hale
1170.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1170.ability: Deploy: Draw up to 2 of Octavia's sons to your hand, then shuffle back the same number of cards.
1170.abilityHTML: Deploy: Draw up to 2 of Octavia's sons to your hand, then shuffle back the same number of cards.
1170.flavor: A mother is more than just the sum of her children.

1171.name: Purge
1171.keywordsHTML: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
1171.ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 3. Increase the damage by 1 for every Witch Hunter on your side of the battlefield.
Deathblow: Place a Bounty on the highest-power enemy unit.
1171.abilityHTML: Damage an enemy unit by 3. Increase the damage by 1 for every Witch Hunter on your side of the battlefield. Deathblow: Place a Bounty on the highest-power enemy unit.
1171.flavor: Thought you could outrun justice, did you, you heathen swine?

1172.name: Savvy Huckster
1172.keywordsHTML: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
1172.ability:
Profit 1.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Bonded: Increase Profit and damage by 1.
1172.abilityHTML: Profit 1. Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Bonded: Increase Profit and damage by 1.
1172.flavor: Good sir, half a crown per stone!? That’s a crime! I’ll take twenty.

1173.name: The Mushy Truffle
1173.keywordsHTML: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1173.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play a Bonded unit from your starting deck.
Order: Spawn and play Golden Froth.
1173.abilityHTML: Resilience. Deploy: Spawn and play a Bonded unit from your starting deck. Order: Spawn and play Golden Froth.
1173.flavor: Some drink to celebrate. Others, to forget. But here? Here we don't need no reason.

1174.name: Alissa Henson
1174.keywordsHTML: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1174.ability: Deploy: Shuffle a special card from your graveyard to your deck. If it was a bronze also shuffle one additional copy of that special.
1174.abilityHTML: Deploy: Shuffle a special card from your graveyard to your deck. If it was a bronze also shuffle one additional copy of that special.
1174.flavor: You either die a hero, or live long enough to be exposed as a villain.
